# global control of the comment system
# you can use multiple comment systems at the same time
# load order: localStorage(user manually selects) -> default
# -> valine -> waline -> twikoo -> gitalk -> giscus -> disqus
comment:
  # comment system title
  title:
    en: Leave a comment
    zh-CN: 说些什么吧！
    zh-TW: 說些什麼吧！
    ja: コメントを残す
    pt-BR: Deixe um comentário
  default: waline # default comment system, when you enable multiple comment systems

# valine comment system. https://valine.js.org
# version 1.5.1
# notify and verify have been deprecated
valine:
  enable: false # if you want to use valine,please set this value is true
  appId: # leancloud application app id
  appKey: # leancloud application app key
  pageSize: 10 # comment list page size
  avatar: mp # gravatar style https://valine.js.org/#/avatar
  # lang: zh-cn # deprecated, use html.lang instead
  placeholder: Just go go # valine comment input placeholder(like: Please leave your footprints )
  guest_info: nick,mail,link #valine comment header info
  recordIP: true # whether to record the IP address of the commenters
  highlight: true # whether to highlight the code blocks
  visitor: false # whether to display the number of visitors
  serverURLs: # leancloud server url

# https://waline.js.org/
waline:
  enable: false
  serverURL:
  # lang: zh-CN # deprecated, use html.lang instead
  locale: {} # https://waline.js.org/guide/features/i18n.html#%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80
  emoji:
    - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.2.0/weibo
    - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.2.0/alus
    - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.2.0/bilibili
    - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.2.0/qq
    - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.2.0/tieba
    - https://unpkg.com/@waline/emojis@1.2.0/tw-emoji
  meta:
    - nick
    - mail
    - link
  requiredMeta:
    - nick
    - mail
  wordLimit: 0
  pageSize: 10
  pageview: true

      subTitle: slide-down

# see https://github.com/D-Sketon/mouse-firework
firework:
  enable: true
  disable_on_mobile: false
  options:
    excludeElements: ["a", "button"]
    particles:
      - shape: circle
        move: ["emit"]
        easing: easeOutExpo
        colors: ["var(--red-1)", "var(--red-2)", "var(--red-3)", "var(--red-4)"]
        number: 20
        duration: [1200, 1800]
        shapeOptions:
          radius: [16, 32]
          alpha: [0.3, 0.5]
      - shape: circle
        move: ["diffuse"]
        easing: easeOutExpo
        colors: ["var(--red-0)"]
        number: 1
        duration: [1200, 1800]
        shapeOptions:
          radius: 20
          alpha: [0.2, 0.5]
          lineWidth: 6

  subtitle: NOT FOUND

    one: "{{- . }} word"
    other: "{{- . }} words"
  time:
    one: "{{- . }} min"
    other: "{{- . }} mins"

  pv: Number of visits
  uv: Number of visitors

  cancel: Cancel

    one: "{{- . }} post"
    other: "{{- . }} posts"

  permalink: "Permalink: "

  date: "Published: "
  updated: "Updated: "
  license: "License: "
  license_content: "All articles on this blog are licensed under the {{ . }} license agreement unless otherwise stated. Please indicate the source when reprinting!"

  date: Published on {{ .pubDate }} at {{ .content }}, last modified on {{ .lastmod }}

  words: word(s)
  total_articles: "$1 article(s), $2 word(s)"

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\404.html
==================================================

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="{{ .Site.Language.LanguageCode }}" 
{{ if eq .Site.Params.dark_mode.enable true -}}
  data-theme-mode="true"
{{ else if eq .Site.Params.dark_mode.enable false -}}
  data-theme-mode="false"
{{ else if eq .Site.Params.dark_mode.enable "auto" -}}
  data-theme-mode="auto"
{{ end }}>
<head>
  {{- if .Site.Params.injector.head_begin -}}
    {{- .Site.Params.injector.head_begin | safeHTML -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- partial "head.html" . -}}
  {{- if .Site.Params.injector.head_end -}}
    {{- .Site.Params.injector.head_end | safeHTML -}}
  {{- end -}}
</head>
<body>
  {{- if .Site.Params.injector.body_begin -}}
    {{- .Site.Params.injector.body_begin | safeHTML -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <div id="container">
    <div id="wrap">
      {{ partial "header.html" (merge (dict "Page" .) (dict "Site" .Site) (dict "Type" "404")) }}
    </div>
  </div>
  
  {{- if .Site.Params.algolia_search.enable -}}
    <div class="site-search">
      <div class="reimu-popup popup">
        <div class="reimu-search">
          <div class="reimu-search-input-icon"></div>
          <div id="reimu-search-input"></div>
          <div class="popup-btn-close"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="reimu-results">
          <div id="reimu-stats"></div>
          <div id="reimu-hits"></div>
          <div id="reimu-pagination" class="reimu-pagination"></div>
        </div>
        <img class="reimu-bg" src="{{ "images/reimu.png" | relURL }}"/>
      </div>
    </div>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- partial "afterFooter.html" . -}}
  {{- if .Site.Params.injector.body_end -}}
    {{- .Site.Params.injector.body_end | safeHTML -}}
  {{- end -}}
</body>
</html>


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\index.html
==================================================

{{- define "main" -}}
  {{- $ctx := . -}}
  {{- $paginator := .Paginate (where .Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections) -}}
  {{- $sort_config := .Site.Params.sort_order.home -}}
  {{- if and (eq 1 $paginator.PageNumber) ($ctx.Site.Params.home_categories.enable) -}}
    <div class="post-categories-wrapper" data-aos="{{ $ctx.Site.Params.animation.options.home.post }}">
      {{- range $k, $v := $ctx.Site.Params.home_categories.content -}}
        {{- if $v.categories -}}
          <div class="post-categories-wrap">
            <a class="post-link" href="{{ (printf "%s%s" "categories/" (urlize $v.categories)) | relLangURL }}" aria-label="{{ $v.categories }}" title="{{ $v.categories }}"></a>
            <div class="post-categories-cover">
              {{- if $v.cover -}}
                <img
                  data-src="{{ $v.cover | relURL }}"
                  data-sizes="auto"
                  alt="{{ $v.categories }}"
                  class="lazyload"
                />
              {{- else -}}
                {{- $cover := partial "helpers/randomCover.html" $ctx -}}
                {{- if $cover -}}
                  <img
                    data-src="{{ $cover | relURL }}"
                    data-sizes="auto"
                    alt="{{ $v.categories }}"
                    class="lazyload"
                  />
                {{- else -}}
                  <img
                    data-src="{{ $ctx.Site.Params.banner | relURL }}"
                    data-sizes="auto"
                    alt="{{ $v.categories }}"
                    class="lazyload"
                  />
                {{- end -}}
              {{- end -}}
              <h2>{{ $v.categories }}</h2>
              <h3>{{ i18n "home_categories.count" (len (index $ctx.Site.Taxonomies.categories (lower $v.categories))) }}</h3>
            </div>
          </div>
        {{- end -}}
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if eq $sort_config "weight" -}}
    {{- range $k, $v := $paginator.Pages.ByWeight -}}
      {{- partial "post.html"  (dict "index" $k "ctx" . "page" $v ) -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "weight-reverse" -}}
    {{- range $k, $v := $paginator.Pages.ByWeight.Reverse -}}
      {{- partial "post.html"  (dict "index" $k "ctx" . "page" $v ) -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "date" -}}
    {{- range $k, $v := $paginator.Pages.ByDate -}}
      {{- partial "post.html" (dict "index" $k "ctx" . "page" $v ) -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "date-reverse" -}}
    {{- range $k, $v := $paginator.Pages.ByDate.Reverse -}}
      {{- partial "post.html" (dict "index" $k "ctx" . "page" $v ) -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "default" -}}
    {{- range $k, $v := $paginator.Pages -}}
      {{- partial "post.html"  (dict "index" $k "ctx" . "page" $v ) -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- partial "pagination.html" . -}}
{{- end -}}

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\archives\section.html

{{- define "main" -}}
  {{- $sort_config := .Site.Params.sort_order.archive -}}
  {{- $paginator := (.Paginate (where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections)).Pages.GroupByDate .Site.Params.yearFormat "desc" -}}
  {{- if eq $sort_config "weight" -}}
    {{- $paginator = (.Paginate (where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections)).Pages.ByWeight -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "weight-reverse" -}}
    {{- $paginator = (.Paginate (where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections)).Pages.ByWeight.Reverse -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "date" -}}
    {{- $paginator = (.Paginate (where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections)).Pages.GroupByDate .Site.Params.yearFormat "asc" -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "default" -}}
    {{- $paginator = (.Paginate (where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections)).Pages -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <div
    class="archives-outer-wrap"
    data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.archive.whole }}"
  >
    {{- if .Site.Params.only_show_capsule_in_index -}}
      {{- if eq .Paginator.PageNumber 1 -}}
        {{- partialCached "archives.html" . -}}
      {{- end -}}
    {{- else -}}
      {{- partialCached "archives.html" . -}}
    {{- end -}}
    {{- partial "list.html" (dict "paginator" $paginator "ctx" .) -}}
  </div>
  {{- partial "pagination.html" . -}}
{{- end -}}

<div id="lazy-script">
  <div>
    {{- if .Permalink -}}
      {{- $desc := "" -}}
      {{- if .Params.description -}}
        {{- $desc = .Params.description | plainify | truncate 300 -}}
      {{- else if .Summary -}}
        {{- $desc = .Summary  | plainify | truncate 300 -}}
      {{- else -}}
        {{- $desc = .RawContent | truncate 300 -}}
      {{- end -}}
      <script data-pjax>
        window.REIMU_POST = {
          author: "{{ .Params.author | default $params.author }}",
          title: "{{ .Title }}",
          url: "{{ .Permalink }}",
          description: "{{ $desc }}",
          cover: {{ if and .Params.cover (not (strings.HasPrefix .Params.cover "rgb")) }}"{{ .Params.cover | absURL }}"{{ else }}"{{ .Site.Params.banner | absURL }}"{{ end }},
        };
      </script>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and (.Store.Get "hasMermaid") .Params.mermaid -}}
      {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.mermaid "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.mermaid "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.mermaid)) 0)) -}}
      {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.dompurify "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.dompurify "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.dompurify)) 0)) -}}
      {{- if $params.mermaid.zoom -}}
        {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.svg_pan_zoom "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.svg_pan_zoom "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.svg_pan_zoom)) 0)) -}}
      {{- end -}}
      <script data-pjax>
        if (window.mermaid) {
          // https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid/issues/1945
          const elementCode = '.mermaid'
          const processElements = (callback) => {
            const els = _$$(elementCode);
            if (!els.length) return Promise.resolve();
            
            return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
              try {
                els.forEach(callback);
                resolve();
              } catch (error) {
                reject(error);
              }
            });
          };
          const saveOriginalData = () => processElements(el => {
            if (!el.getAttribute('data-original-code')) {
              el.setAttribute('data-original-code', el.innerHTML);
            }
          });

          const resetProcessed = () => processElements(el => {
            const originalCode = el.getAttribute('data-original-code');
            if (originalCode) {
              el.removeAttribute('data-processed');
              el.innerHTML = DOMPurify.sanitize(originalCode);
            }
          });
          const loadMermaid = async (theme) => {
            window.mermaid.initialize({theme, startOnLoad: false})
            await window.mermaid.run({querySelector: elementCode, suppressErrors: true})
            if (window.svgPanZoom) {
              window.__panZoomList?.forEach(panZoom => {try {panZoom.destroy()} catch {}});
              window.__panZoomList = [];
              _$$('.mermaid > svg').forEach(el => {
                const bbox = el.getBBox();
                el.setAttribute('height', Math.max(bbox.height, 80));
                window.__panZoomList.push(window.svgPanZoom(el, {
                  zoomEnabled: true,
                  controlIconsEnabled: true,
                  fit: true,
                  center: true
                }));
              });
              if (window.__resizeMermaidSvg) {
                window.removeEventListener('resize', window.__resizeMermaidSvg);
              }
              window.__resizeMermaidSvg = () => {
                try {
                  window.__panZoomList.forEach(panZoom => {
                    panZoom.resize();
                    panZoom.fit();
                    panZoom.center();
                  });
                } catch {
                  window.removeEventListener('resize', window.__resizeMermaidSvg);
                  window.__panZoomList = [];
                }
              }
              window.addEventListener('resize', window.__resizeMermaidSvg);
            }
          }
          const initMermaid = async (theme) => {
            try {
              await saveOriginalData();
              await resetProcessed();
              await loadMermaid(theme);
            } catch (error) {
              console.error(error);
            }
          };
          
          document.body.addEventListener('dark-theme-set', () => initMermaid('dark'));
          document.body.addEventListener('light-theme-set', () => initMermaid('default'));

          const mode = localStorage.getItem('dark_mode');
          if (mode === 'auto') {
            const osMode = window.matchMedia("(prefers-color-scheme: dark)").matches;
            initMermaid(osMode ? 'dark' : 'default');
          } else {
            initMermaid(mode === 'true' ? 'dark' : 'default');
          }
        }
      </script>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if not .IsHome -}}
      {{- partial "helpers/ts.html" (dict "source" "js/insert_highlight.ts" "pjax" true "ctx" .) -}}
      {{- partial "helpers/ts.html" (dict "source" "js/tabs.ts" "pjax" true "ctx" .) -}}
      {{- $photoswipe_lightbox := index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.photoswipe_lightbox "ctx" $site)) 0 -}}
      {{- $photoswipe_lightbox_integrity := index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.photoswipe_lightbox)) 0 -}}
      {{- $photoswipe := index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.photoswipe "ctx" $site)) 0 -}}
      {{- $photoswipe_integrity := index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.photoswipe)) 0 -}}
      <script type="module" data-pjax>
        {{- if (partial "helpers/vendorLocalCheck.html" $js.photoswipe_lightbox) -}}
        import PhotoSwipeLightbox from '{{ $photoswipe_lightbox }}';
        {{- else -}}
        const PhotoSwipeLightbox = (await safeImport("{{ $photoswipe_lightbox }}", "{{ $photoswipe_lightbox_integrity }}")).default;
        {{- end -}}
        const initPswp = (gallery, children) => {
          if (_$$(`${gallery} ${children}`).length > 0) {
            new PhotoSwipeLightbox({
              gallery,
              children,
              {{- if (partial "helpers/vendorLocalCheck.html" $js.photoswipe) -}}
              pswpModule: () => import('{{ $photoswipe }}'),
              {{- else -}}
              pswpModule: () => safeImport("{{ $photoswipe }}", "{{ $photoswipe_integrity }}")
              {{- end -}}
            }).init();
          }
        }
        const pswp = () => {
          initPswp('.article-entry', 'a.article-gallery-item');
          initPswp('.article-gallery', 'a.article-gallery-item');
          window.lightboxStatus = 'done';
          window.removeEventListener('lightbox:ready', pswp);
        }
        if(window.lightboxStatus === 'ready') {
          pswp()
        } else {
          window.addEventListener('lightbox:ready', pswp);
        }
      </script>
      {{- partial "post/comment.html" . -}}
      {{- if and (reflect.IsSlice .Site.Params.share) (in .Site.Params.share "weixin") -}}
        {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.qrcode "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.qrcode "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "defer" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.qrcode)) 0)) -}}
        {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.snapdom "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.snapdom "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "defer" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.snapdom)) 0)) -}}
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if .Params.math -}}
      {{- if .Site.Params.math.katex.enable -}}
        {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.katex "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.katex "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.katex)) 0)) -}}
        {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.katex_auto_render "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.katex_auto_render "ctx" $site)) 0) "pjax" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.katex_auto_render)) 0)) -}}
        <script data-pjax>
          var renderMath = () => {
            if (!window.renderMathInElement) return;
            window.renderMathInElement(_$("article"), {
              delimiters: [
                { left: "$$", right: "$$", display: true },
                { left: "\\[", right: "\\]", display: true },
                { left: "$", right: "$", display: false },
                { left: "\\(", right: "\\)", display: false },
              ],
            });
          };
          if (document.readyState === "loading") {
            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", renderMath, { once: true });
          } else {
            renderMath();
          }
        </script>
      {{- end -}}
      {{- if .Site.Params.math.mathjax.enable -}}
        <script data-pjax>
          window.MathJax = JSON.parse({{ .Site.Params.math.mathjax.options | jsonify }})[0];
        </script>
        {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.mathjax "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.mathjax "ctx" $site)) 0) "defer" true "pjax" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.mathjax)) 0)) -}}
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
  </div>
</div>

{{- if $params.outdate.enable -}}
  <script data-pjax>
    var updateTime = _$('#post-update-time')?.innerHTML;

    if (updateTime) {
      const update = new Date(updateTime);
      const now = new Date();
      const diff = now - update;
      const days = diff / 86400000;
      const { daysago: daysAgo, message: template } = window.siteConfig.outdate;
      if (days >= daysAgo) {
        let message = `This article was last updated on ${updateTime}. Please note that the content may no longer be applicable.`;
        if (typeof template === 'string') {
          message = template.replace(/{time}/, updateTime);
        } else if (typeof template === 'object') {
          const lang = document.documentElement.lang;
          const messageKey = Object.keys(template).find(key => key.toLowerCase() === lang.toLowerCase());
          if (messageKey && template[messageKey]) {
            message = template[messageKey].replace(/{time}/, updateTime);
          }
        }
        const blockquote = _$('#outdate-blockquote');
        if (blockquote) {
          blockquote.querySelectorAll('p')[1].innerText = message;
          blockquote.style.display = 'flow-root';
        }
      }
    }
  </script>
{{- end -}}

{{- if $params.footer.busuanzi -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.busuanzi "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.busuanzi "ctx" $site)) 0) "async" true "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.busuanzi)) 0)) -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if $params.service_worker.enable -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/ts.html" (dict "source" "js/sw.ts" "ctx" . "inline" false "target" "sw.js") -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/ts.html" (dict "source" "js/service_worker.ts" "ctx" .) -}}
{{- else -}}
  <script>
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
      navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistrations().then((registrations) => {
        for (let registration of registrations) {
          registration.unregister();
        }
      });
    }
  </script>
{{- end -}}

<script>
  const reimuCopyright = String.raw`
   ______     ______     __     __    __     __  __    
  /\  == \   /\  ___\   /\ \   /\ "-./  \   /\ \/\ \   
  \ \  __<   \ \  __\   \ \ \  \ \ \-./\ \  \ \ \_\ \  
   \ \_\ \_\  \ \_____\  \ \_\  \ \_\ \ \_\  \ \_____\ 
    \/_/ /_/   \/_____/   \/_/   \/_/  \/_/   \/_____/ 
                                                    
  `;
  console.log(String.raw`%c ${reimuCopyright}`, "color: #ff5252;");
  console.log(
    "%c Theme.Reimu" + " %c https://github.com/D-Sketon/hugo-theme-reimu ",
    "color: white; background: #ff5252; padding:5px 0;",
    "padding:4px;border:1px solid #ff5252;",
  );
</script>

{{- if $params.player.aplayer.enable -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.aplayer "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.aplayer "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.aplayer)) 0)) -}}
  {{- if not $params.player.meting.enable -}}
    <script>
      if (!{{ $params.player.disable_on_mobile | default false }} || !window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches) {
        if (window.matchMedia('(max-width: 959px)').matches) {
        const aplayer = _$('#aplayer');
          if (aplayer) {
            const aside = aplayer.parentNode?.parentNode;
            if (aside?.tagName === 'ASIDE') {
              aplayer.removeAttribute('data-aos');
              aside.parentNode.removeChild(aplayer);
              document.body.appendChild(aplayer);
            }
          }
        }
        const ap = new APlayer({
            theme: "var(--color-link)",
            container: document.getElementById('aplayer'),
            audio: JSON.parse({{ $params.player.aplayer.options.audio | jsonify }}) || [],
            fixed: isMobile ? true : ({{ $params.player.aplayer.options.fixed }} || false),
            autoplay: {{ $params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay }} || false,
            loop: '{{ $params.player.aplayer.options.loop }}' || 'all',
            order: '{{ $params.player.aplayer.options.order }}' || 'list',
            preload: '{{ $params.player.aplayer.options.preload }}' || 'auto',
            volume: {{ $params.player.aplayer.options.volume }} || 0.7,
            mutex: {{ $params.player.aplayer.options.mutex }} || true,
            listFolded: {{ $params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded }} || false,
            lrcType: {{ $params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType }} || 0,
        });
      }
    </script>
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if $params.player.meting.enable -}}
  {{- if $params.player.meting.meting_api -}}
    <script>
      var meting_api = '{{ $params.player.meting.meting_api }}';
    </script>
  {{- end -}}
  <script>
    if (!{{ $params.player.disable_on_mobile | default false }} || !window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches) {
      if (window.matchMedia('(max-width: 959px)').matches) {
        const meting = _$('meting-js');
        if (meting) {
          meting.setAttribute('fixed', 'true');
          const aside = meting.parentNode?.parentNode;
          if (aside?.tagName === 'ASIDE') {
            meting.parentNode.removeChild(meting);
            document.body.appendChild(meting);
          }
        }
      }
      const script = document.createElement('script');
      script.src = "{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.meting "ctx" $site)) 0 }}";
      script.integrity = "{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.meting)) 0 }}";
      script.crossOrigin = "anonymous";
      document.body.appendChild(script);
    }
  </script>
{{- end -}}

{{- if .Site.Params.pangu.enable -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.pangu "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.pangu "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.pangu)) 0)) -}}
  <script data-pjax>
    if (document.readyState === "loading") {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        pangu?.spacingPage();
      });
    } else {
      pangu?.spacingPage();
    }
  </script>
{{- end -}}

      >

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\article.html
==================================================

<article
  class="h-entry article"
  itemscope
  itemtype="https://schema.org/BlogPosting"
>
  <div
    class="article-inner"
    data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.whole }}"
  >
    <div class="article-meta">
      {{- partial "post/date.html" . -}}
      {{- partial "post/category.html" . -}}
    </div>
    {{- partial "post/summary.html" . -}}
    <div class="hr-line"></div>
    {{- partial "post/gallery.html" . -}}
    <div class="e-content article-entry" itemprop="articleBody">
      {{- if .Params.outdated -}}
        <blockquote class="alert-blockquote warning">
          <p class="alert-heading">WARNING</p>
          <p>
            {{ $msg := index .Site.Params.outdate.message $.Language.Lang | default "This article was last updated on {time}. Please note that the content may no longer be applicable." }}
            {{ replace $msg "{time}" ($.Lastmod.Format $.Site.Params.dateFormat) }}
          </p>
        </blockquote>
      {{- else if .Site.Params.outdate.enable -}}
        <blockquote
          class="alert-blockquote warning"
          id="outdate-blockquote"
          style="display: none;"
        >
          <p class="alert-heading">WARNING</p>
          <p></p>
        </blockquote>
      {{- end -}}
      {{- if and .Params.excerpt .Params.link -}}
        <p>{{ .Params.excerpt | safeHTML }}</p>
        <p class="article-more-link">
          <a
            href="{{ .Params.link }}"
            target="_blank"
            itemprop="url"
            rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
            >{{ .Site.Params.excerpt_link | default "Read More" }}</a
          >
        </p>
      {{- else -}}
        {{ .Content | safeHTML }}
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
    <footer class="article-footer">
      {{- if or (eq .Params.copyright true) (and (not (eq .Params.copyright false)) .Site.Params.article_copyright.enable) -}}
        {{- partial "post/copyright.html" . -}}
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if or (eq .Params.sponsor true) (and (not (eq .Params.sponsor false)) .Site.Params.sponsor.enable) -}}
        {{- partial "post/sponsor.html" . -}}
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if reflect.IsSlice .Site.Params.share -}}
        {{- partial "post/share.html" . -}}
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) .Site.Params.valine.enable .Site.Params.valine.appId .Site.Params.valine.appKey -}}
        <a
          data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.comment }}"
          href="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}#comments"
          class="article-comment-link"
        >
          <span
            class="post-comments-count valine-comment-count"
            data-xid="{{ .Permalink | relURL | urlize }}"
            itemprop="commentCount"
          ></span>
          {{ i18n "comment" }}
        </a>
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) .Site.Params.waline.enable .Site.Params.waline.serverURL -}}
        <a
          data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.comment }}"
          href="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}#comments"
          class="article-comment-link"
        >
          <span
            class="post-comments-count waline-comment-count"
            data-path="{{ .Permalink | relURL | urlize }}"
            itemprop="commentCount"
          ></span>
          {{ i18n "comment" }}
        </a>
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) .Site.Params.twikoo.enable .Site.Params.twikoo.envId -}}
        <a
          data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.comment }}"
          href="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}#comments"
          class="article-comment-link"
        >
          <span
            class="post-comments-count twikoo-comment-count"
            data-path="{{ .Permalink | urlize }}"
            itemprop="commentCount"
          ></span>
          {{ i18n "comment" }}
        </a>
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) .Site.Params.disqus.enable .Site.Params.disqus.shortname .Site.Params.disqus.count -}}
        <a
          data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.comment }}"
          class="article-comment-link"
          id="disqus-count"
        >
        </a>
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) .Site.Params.valine.enable .Site.Params.valine.appId .Site.Params.valine.appKey .Site.Params.valine.visitor -}}
        <span
          data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.reading }}"
          id="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}"
          class="leancloud_visitors article-visitor-link"
          data-flag-title="{{ .Title }}"
        >
          <span class="leancloud-visitors-count">0</span>
          <em class="post-meta-item-text">{{ i18n "reading" }}</em>
        </span>
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) .Site.Params.waline.enable .Site.Params.waline.serverURL .Site.Params.waline.pageview -}}
        <span
          data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.reading }}"
          class="article-visitor-link"
        >
          <span
            class="waline-pageview-count"
            data-path="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}"
            >0</span
          >
          <em class="post-meta-item-text">{{ i18n "reading" }}</em>
        </span>
      {{- end -}}
      {{- partial "post/tag.html" . -}}
    </footer>
  </div>
  {{- if in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type -}}
    {{- partial "post/nav.html" . -}}
  {{- end -}}
</article>
{{- partial "comment.html" . -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\comment.html
==================================================

{{- $params := .Site.Params -}}

{{- $commentSystems := dict 
  "valine" (cond (and $params.valine.enable $params.valine.appId $params.valine.appKey) true false)
  "waline" (cond (and $params.waline.enable $params.waline.serverURL) true false)
  "twikoo" (cond (and $params.twikoo.enable $params.twikoo.envId) true false)
  "gitalk" (cond (and $params.gitalk.enable $params.gitalk.clientID $params.gitalk.clientSecret) true false)
  "giscus" (cond $params.giscus.enable true false)
  "disqus" (cond (and $params.disqus.enable $params.disqus.shortname) true false)
-}}

{{- $activeSystems := slice -}}
{{- range $key, $value := $commentSystems -}}
  {{- if $value -}}
    {{- $activeSystems = $activeSystems | append $key -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) (len $activeSystems) -}}
<section id="comments" data-aos="{{ $params.animation.options.article.whole }}">
<div class="comment-header">
  {{- $languageCode := .Site.Language.LanguageCode -}}
  {{- $commentTitle := $params.comment.title -}}
  {{- $realTitle := "" -}}
  {{- if reflect.IsMap $commentTitle -}}
    {{- $realTitle = index $commentTitle $languageCode -}}
    {{- if not $realTitle -}}
      {{- $realTitle = index $commentTitle "en" -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- else -}}
    {{- $realTitle = $commentTitle -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <h2 class="comment-title">{{ $realTitle }}</h2>
  <div class="comment-selector">
    <div class="comment-selector-wrap">
      {{- range $name, $enabled := $commentSystems -}}
        {{- if $enabled -}}
        <div class="selector-item" data-selector="{{ $name }}">
          <span>{{ $name }}</span>
        </div>
        {{- end -}}
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="comment-content">
  {{- range $name, $enabled := $commentSystems -}}
    {{- if and $enabled (ne $name "disqus") -}}
    <div class="comment {{ $name }}-comment" data-aos="{{ $params.animation.options.article.whole }}"
     {{ if eq $name "gitalk" }}id="gitalk-comment"{{ end }}>
    </div>
    {{- else if and $enabled (eq $name "disqus") -}}
    <div class="comment disqus-comment" data-aos="{{ $params.animation.options.article.whole }}">
      <div id="disqus_thread"></div>
    </div>
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
</div>
</section>
{{- end -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\footer.html
==================================================

{{- $totalWordCount := 0 -}}
{{- $totalReadingTime := 0 -}}
{{- $posts := (where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections) -}}
{{- range $posts -}}
  {{- $totalWordCount = add $totalWordCount .WordCount -}}
  {{- $totalReadingTime = add $totalReadingTime .ReadingTime -}}
{{- end -}}

<footer id="footer" aria-label="Site footer">
  <div style="width: 100%; overflow: hidden">
    <div class="footer-line"></div>
  </div>
  <div id="footer-info">
    {{- if .Site.Params.copyright -}}
      {{- .Site.Params.copyright | safeHTML -}}
    {{- end -}}
    <div>
      <span class="icon-copyright"></span>
      {{- if eq (string .Site.Params.footer.since) (now.Format .Site.Params.yearFormat) -}}
        {{- now.Format .Site.Params.yearFormat -}}
      {{- else -}}
        {{- .Site.Params.footer.since -}} -
        {{- now.Format .Site.Params.yearFormat -}}
      {{- end -}}
      <span class="footer-info-sep {{ if .Site.Params.footer.icon.rotate }}rotate{{ end }}"></span>
      {{ .Site.Params.author | default .Site.Title }}
    </div>
    {{- if .Site.Params.footer.powered -}}
      <div>
        {{ i18n "powered_by" }}&nbsp;<a
          href="https://gohugo.io/"
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
          >Hugo</a
        >&nbsp; Theme.<a
          href="https://github.com/D-Sketon/hugo-theme-reimu"
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
          >Reimu</a
        >
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if .Site.Params.footer.count -}}
      <div>
        <span class="icon-brush"
          >&nbsp;{{- if gt $totalWordCount 1000 -}}
            {{- printf "%.1fk" (div $totalWordCount 1000.0) -}}
          {{- else -}}
            {{- $totalWordCount -}}
          {{- end -}}</span
        >
        &nbsp;|&nbsp;
        <span class="icon-coffee">&nbsp;
          {{- $hours := div $totalReadingTime 60 -}}
          {{- $minutes := mod $totalReadingTime 60 -}}

          {{- printf "%02d:%02d" $hours $minutes -}}
        </span>
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if .Site.Params.icp.icpnumber -}}
      <div class="footer-beian">
        <a target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" href="https://beian.miit.gov.cn"
          >{{ .Site.Params.icp.icpnumber }}</a
        >
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.icp.beian .Site.Params.icp.recordcode -}}
      <div class="footer-beian">
        <img
          style="object-fit: contain;margin-right: 2px;"
          src="data:image/png;base64,"
          alt=""
        />
        <a
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
          href="https://beian.mps.gov.cn/#/query/webSearch?code={{ .Site.Params.icp.recordcode }}"
          >{{ .Site.Params.icp.beian }}</a
        >
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if .Site.Params.moe_icp.icpnumber -}}
      <div class="footer-beian">
        <img
          style="object-fit: contain;margin-right: 2px;"
          src="https://icp.gov.moe/images/ico64.png"
          alt=""
          width="24"
          height="24"
        />
        <a
          target="_blank"
          rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
          href="https://icp.gov.moe/?keyword={{ .Site.Params.moe_icp.icpnumber }}"
          >萌ICP备{{ .Site.Params.moe_icp.icpnumber }}号</a
        >
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if .Site.Params.footer.busuanzi -}}
      <div>
        <span class="icon-eye"></span>
        <span id="busuanzi_container_site_pv"
          >{{ i18n "busuanzi.pv" }}&nbsp;<span
            id="busuanzi_value_site_pv"
          ></span
        ></span>
        &nbsp;|&nbsp;
        <span class="icon-user"></span>
        <span id="busuanzi_container_site_uv"
          >{{ i18n "busuanzi.uv" }}&nbsp;<span
            id="busuanzi_value_site_uv"
          ></span
        ></span>
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
  </div>
</footer>


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\head.html
==================================================

<meta charset="utf-8" />
<meta
  name="viewport"
  content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no"
/>
{{- partial "head/init.html" . -}}
{{- $title := .Title -}}
{{- if .IsHome -}}
  {{- $title = site.Title -}}
{{- else if eq .Type "archives" -}}
  {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" (i18n "archive_a") .Site.Params.author -}}
{{- else if eq .Type "tags" -}}
  {{- if eq .Title "Tags" -}}
    {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" (i18n "tag") .Site.Params.author -}}
  {{- else -}}
    {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" .Title .Site.Params.author -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- else if eq .Type "categories" -}}
  {{- if eq .Title "Categories" -}}
    {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" (i18n "category") .Site.Params.author -}}
  {{- else -}}
    {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" .Title .Site.Params.author -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- else if .Title -}}
  {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" .Title .Site.Params.author -}}
{{- else -}}
  {{- $title = printf "%s | %s" .Title .Site.Params.author -}}
{{- end -}}
<title>
  {{ $title | safeHTML }}
</title>
<meta name="description" content="{{ .Params.description | default .Site.Params.description | safeHTML }}"/>
{{- $keywords := default .Site.Params.keywords .Params.keywords -}}
{{- with $keywords }}
  {{- if reflect.IsSlice . }}
    <meta name="keywords" content="{{ delimit . ", " }}" />
  {{- else }}
    <meta name="keywords" content="{{ . }}" />
  {{- end }}
{{- end }}
{{- $site := .Site -}}
{{- partialCached "head/analytics.html" . -}}
{{- partialCached "head/config.html" . -}}

{{- if .Site.Params.custom_font.enable -}}
  {{- partialCached "helpers/vendorFont.html" . -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if .Site.Params.font.enable -}}
  {{- partialCached "helpers/vendorGoogleFont.html" . -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $js := .Site.Data.vendor.js -}}
{{- $css := .Site.Data.vendor.css -}}
<!-- icon -->
{{- if .Site.Params.icon_font -}}
  <link
    rel="preload"
    href="//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_{{ .Site.Params.icon_font }}.woff2"
    as="font"
    type="font/woff2"
    crossorigin="anonymous"
  />
{{- else -}}
  {{- range $css.fontawesome.high_priority -}}
    {{- partial "helpers/css.html" (dict "raw" . "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" . "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" .)) 0)) -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- range $css.fontawesome.low_priority -}}
    {{- partial "helpers/asyncCss.html" (dict "raw" . "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" . "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" .)) 0)) -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}
<!-- loader -->
{{- if .Site.Params.preloader.enable -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/loader.scss" "temp" "loader.scss" "target" "css/loader.css" "ctx" .) -}}
{{- end -}}
<!-- open-graph -->
{{- if .Site.Params.open_graph.enable -}}
  <meta property="og:type" content="website" />
  <meta property="og:title" content="{{ $title | safeHTML }}" />
  <meta
    property="og:description"
    content="{{ .Params.description | default .Site.Params.description | safeHTML }}"
  />
  <meta property="og:url" content="{{ .Permalink }}" />
  <meta
    property="og:site_name"
    content="{{ .Site.Params.title | default .Site.Title | safeHTML }}"
  />
  <meta
    property="og:image"
    content="{{ (.Params.cover | relURL) | default (.Site.Params.banner | relURL) }}"
  />
  <meta property="article:author" content="{{ .Site.Params.author | safeHTML }}" />
  <meta property="article:published_time" content="{{ .Date.Format "2006-01-02T15:04:05-07:00" }}" />
  <meta property="article:modified_time" content="{{ .Lastmod.Format "2006-01-02T15:04:05-07:00" }}" />
  {{- if .Params.tags -}}
    <meta property="article:tag" content="{{ range .Params.tags }}{{ . }}{{ end }}" />
  {{- end -}}
  {{- $openGraphOptions := .Site.Params.open_graph.options -}}
  <meta name="twitter:card" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.twitter_card | default "summary" }}" />
  <meta name="twitter:image" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.twitter_image | default (.Params.cover | relURL) | default (.Site.Params.banner | relURL) }}" />
  {{- if $openGraphOptions.twitter_site -}}
    <meta name="twitter:site" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.twitter_site }}" />
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $openGraphOptions.twitter_id -}}
    <meta name="twitter:creator" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.twitter_id }}" />
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $openGraphOptions.fb_app_id -}}
    <meta property="fb:app_id" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.fb_app_id }}" />
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $openGraphOptions.fb_admins -}}
    <meta property="fb:admin_id" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.fb_admins }}" />
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $openGraphOptions.google_plus -}}
    <meta property="g+:profile_link" content="{{ $openGraphOptions.google_plus }}" />
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}
<!-- rss -->
{{- with .OutputFormats.Get "rss" -}}
  {{- printf `<link rel=%q type=%q href=%q title=%q>` .Rel .MediaType.Type .Permalink site.Title | safeHTML -}}
{{- end -}}
<!-- favicon use default -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="{{ "favicon.ico" | relURL }}">
{{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/main.scss" "temp" "main.scss" "target" "css/main.css" "ctx" .) -}}
<!-- photo-swipe -->
{{- partial "helpers/asyncCss.html" (dict "raw" $css.photoswipe "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $css.photoswipe "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $css.photoswipe)) 0)) -}}
<!-- katex -->
{{- partial "helpers/asyncCss.html" (dict "raw" $css.katex "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $css.katex "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $css.katex)) 0)) -}}
<!-- waline -->
{{- if and .Site.Params.waline.enable .Site.Params.waline.serverURL -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/css.html" (dict "raw" $css.waline "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $css.waline "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $css.waline)) 0)) -}}
{{- end -}}
<!-- gitalk -->
{{- if and .Site.Params.gitalk.enable .Site.Params.gitalk.clientID .Site.Params.gitalk.clientSecret -}}
  {{- partial "helpers/css.html" (dict "raw" $css.gitalk "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $css.gitalk "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $css.gitalk)) 0)) -}}
{{- end -}}
<!-- pace -->

  {{- partial "helpers/js.html" (dict "raw" $js.pace "src" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.pace "ctx" $site)) 0) "integrity" (index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.pace)) 0)) -}}

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\header.html

{{- $params := .Site.Params -}}
<div id="header-nav">
  <nav id="main-nav" aria-label="Primary navigation">
    {{- range .Site.Params.menu -}}
      <a class="main-nav-link-wrap" href="{{ .url | relLangURL }}">
        <div class='main-nav-icon icon {{ if or (and (eq .icon "e62b") ($params.icon_font)) (and (eq .icon "f6ad") (not $params.icon_font)) (not .icon) }}rotate{{ end }}'>
          {{- if .icon -}}
            {{- if and (strings.Contains .icon ".") (strings.Contains .icon "/") -}}
              <img src="{{ .icon | relURL }}" alt="{{ .name }} icon" class="" style="height: 1em;">
            {{- else -}}
              &#x{{- .icon -}};
            {{- end -}}
          {{- else -}}
            {{- if $params.icon_font -}}
              &#xe62b;
            {{- else -}}
              &#xf6ad;
            {{- end -}}
          {{- end -}}
        </div>
        <span class="main-nav-link">{{ i18n .name }}</span>
      </a>
    {{- end -}}
    <a id="main-nav-toggle" class="nav-icon" aria-label="Toggle navigation" role="button"></a>
  </nav>
  <nav id="sub-nav" aria-label="Secondary navigation">
    {{- with .OutputFormats.Get "rss" -}}
      <a id="nav-rss-link" class="nav-icon" href="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}" title="{{ i18n "rss_feed" }}" aria-label="{{ i18n "rss_feed" }}" target="_blank"></a>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if .Site.Params.algolia_search.enable -}}
      <a id="nav-search-btn" class="nav-icon popup-trigger" title="{{ i18n "search" }}" aria-label="{{ i18n "search" }}"></a>
    {{- end -}}
  </nav>
  {{- if and hugo.IsMultilingual (ne "404" .Type) -}}
    {{- $i18nMap := dict -}}
    {{- range .Site.Languages -}}
      {{- $i18nMap = merge $i18nMap (dict .Lang .LanguageName) -}}
    {{- end -}}
    <nav id="i18n-nav" aria-label="Language selection">
      <div class="custom-dropdown">
        <div class="select-selected" id="select-selected" role="button" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Language menu">
          <span id="nav-language-btn" class="nav-icon" style="padding: 0 20px 0 0"></span>
          <span id="selected-lang">{{ index $i18nMap $.Language.Lang }}</span>
        </div>
        <ul class="select-items" id="select-items" role="listbox" aria-label="Languages">
          {{- range .Site.Languages -}}
            <li data-value="{{ .Lang }}" role="option" {{ if eq $.Language.Lang .Lang }}class="selected" arial-selected="true"{{ else }}arial-selected="false"{{ end }} >{{ .LanguageName }}</li>
          {{- end -}}
        </ul>
      </div>
      <script>
        var selectSelected = document.getElementById("select-selected");
        var selectedLang = document.getElementById("selected-lang");
        var selectItems = document.getElementById("select-items");
        var selectOptions = selectItems.querySelectorAll("li");

        selectSelected.addEventListener("click", () => {
          selectItems.classList.toggle("show");
          var expanded = selectSelected.getAttribute("aria-expanded") === "true";
          selectSelected.setAttribute("aria-expanded", (!expanded).toString());
        });

        selectOptions.forEach((item) => {
          item.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const langMap = {};
            {{- with .Translations -}}
              {{- range . -}}
              langMap['{{ .Language.Lang }}'] = '{{ .RelPermalink }}'; 
              {{- end -}}
            {{- end -}}
            selectedLang.textContent = item.textContent;
            selectItems.classList.remove("show");
            selectOptions.forEach((option) => {
              option.classList.remove("selected");
            });
            item.classList.add("selected");
            if (item.dataset.value === '{{ $.Language.Lang }}') {
              return;
            }
            if (!langMap[item.dataset.value]) {
              _$("#lang-tooltip").style.opacity = "1";
              setTimeout(() => {
                _$("#lang-tooltip").style.opacity = "0";
              }, 1000);
              return;
            }
            window.location = langMap[item.dataset.value];
          });
        });

        document.addEventListener("click", (event) => {
          if (!event.target.closest(".custom-dropdown")) {
            selectItems.classList.remove("show");
            selectSelected.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false");
          }
        });
      </script>
    </nav>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if .Site.Params.triangle_badge.enable -}}
    <a href="{{ .Site.Params.triangle_badge.link }}" class="triangle-badge" title="{{ .Site.Params.triangle_badge.icon }}" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer">
      <div class="icon icon-{{ .Site.Params.triangle_badge.icon }} triangle-badge-icon"></div>
    </a>
  {{- end -}}
</div>
<header id="header" aria-label="Site header">
  {{- if and .Params.cover (strings.HasPrefix .Params.cover "rgb") -}}
    <picture></picture>
    <img style="position: absolute;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 180%;z-index: -2;display: block;background: {{ .Params.cover | safeCSS }};mask: linear-gradient(to top, transparent, #fff 50%);"></img>
  {{- else if .Params.cover -}}
    <picture></picture>
    <img {{ if .Site.Params.material_theme.enable }}crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end }} fetchpriority="high" src="{{ .Params.cover | relURL }}" alt="{{ .Title }}">
  {{- else if eq .Params.cover false -}}
    <picture></picture>
    <img style="visibility:hidden"></img>
  {{- else -}}
    {{- if in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type -}}
      {{- if and .Site.Params.cover (strings.HasPrefix .Site.Params.cover "rgb") -}}
        <picture></picture>
        <img style="position: absolute;top: 0;left: 0;width: 100%;height: 180%;z-index: -2;display: block;background: {{ .Site.Params.cover | safeCSS }};mask: linear-gradient(to top, transparent, #fff 50%);"></img>
      {{- else if .Site.Params.cover -}}
        <picture></picture>
        <img {{ if .Site.Params.material_theme.enable }}crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end }} fetchpriority="high" src="{{ .Site.Params.cover | relURL }}" alt="{{ .Title }}">
      {{- else if eq .Site.Params.cover false -}}
        <picture></picture>
        <img style="visibility:hidden"></img>
      {{- else -}}
        <picture>
          {{- if .Site.Params.banner_srcset.enable -}}
            {{- range .Site.Params.banner_srcset.srcset -}}
              <source media="{{ .media }}" srcset="{{ .src | relURL }}">
            {{- end -}}
            <img {{ if .Site.Params.material_theme.enable }}crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end }} fetchpriority="high" src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}" alt="{{ .Title }}">
          {{- end -}}
        </picture>
        {{- if .Site.Params.banner_srcset.enable -}}
          <img alt="{{ .Title }}" style="visibility: hidden;">
        {{- else -}}
          <img {{ if .Site.Params.material_theme.enable }}crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end }} fetchpriority="high" src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}" alt="{{ .Title }}">
        {{- end -}}
      {{- end -}}
    {{- else -}}
      <picture>
        {{- if .Site.Params.banner_srcset.enable -}}
          {{- range .Site.Params.banner_srcset.srcset -}}
            <source media="{{ .media }}" srcset="{{ .src | relURL }}">
          {{- end -}}
          <img {{ if .Site.Params.material_theme.enable }}crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end }} fetchpriority="high" src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}" alt="{{ .Title }}">
        {{- end -}}
      </picture>
      {{- if .Site.Params.banner_srcset.enable -}}
        <img alt="{{ .Title }}" style="visibility: hidden;">
      {{- else -}}
        <img {{ if .Site.Params.material_theme.enable }}crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end }} fetchpriority="high" src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}" alt="{{ .Title }}">
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}

  <div id="header-outer">
    <div id="header-title">
      {{- if eq .Type "404" -}}
        <a href="{{ "" | relLangURL }}" id="logo">
          <h1 data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.header.title }}">{{ i18n "not_found.title" }}</h1>
        </a>
      {{- else -}}
        {{- $title := "" -}}
        {{- if .IsHome -}}
          {{- $title = .Site.Title -}}
        {{- else if eq .Type "archives" -}}
          {{- $title = i18n "archive_a" -}}
        {{- else if eq .Type "tags" -}}
          {{- $title = i18n "tag" -}}
        {{- else if eq .Type "categories" -}}
          {{- $title = i18n "category" -}}
        {{- else if .Title -}}
          {{- $title = .Title -}}
        {{- else -}}
          {{- $title = .Site.Title -}}
        {{- end -}}
  
        {{- if $title -}}
          <span id="logo">
            <h1 data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.header.title }}">{{ $title }}</h1>
          </span>
        {{- end -}}
      {{- end -}}
  
      {{- if eq .Type "404" -}}
        <h2 id="subtitle-wrap" data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.header.subTitle }}">
          <a href="{{ "" | relLangURL }}" id="subtitle">{{ i18n "not_found.subtitle" }}</a>
        </h2>
      {{- else -}}
        {{- $subtitle := "" -}}
        {{- if .IsHome -}}
          {{- $subtitle = .Site.Params.subtitle | default .Site.Params.subtitle -}}
        {{- else if and (eq .Type "categories") (not (eq .Title "Categories")) -}}
          {{- $subtitle = .Title -}}
        {{- else if and (eq .Type "tags") (not (eq .Title "Tags")) -}}
          {{- $subtitle = .Title -}}
        {{- else if and .Site.Params.summary.enable (eq .Site.Params.summary.style "subtitle") (in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type) -}}
          {{- if .Summary -}}
            {{- $subtitle = .Summary | plainify | truncate 200 -}}
          {{- end -}}
        {{- end -}}
        <h2 id="subtitle-wrap" data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.header.subTitle }}">
          {{- if $subtitle -}}
            <span id="subtitle">{{ $subtitle }}</span>
          {{- end -}}
        </h2>
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
  </div>
</header>

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\list.html
==================================================

{{- $paginator := .paginator -}}
{{- $ctx := .ctx -}}
{{- $type := $ctx.Type -}}

{{- $sort_config := "date-reverse" -}}
{{- if eq $type "categories" -}}
  {{- $sort_config = $ctx.Site.Params.sort_order.taxonomy.category -}}
{{- else if eq $type "tags" -}}
  {{- $sort_config = $ctx.Site.Params.sort_order.taxonomy.tag -}}
{{- else if eq $type "archives" -}}
  {{- $sort_config = $ctx.Site.Params.sort_order.archive -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if or (eq $sort_config "weight") (eq $sort_config "weight-reverse") (eq $sort_config "default") -}}
  <section class="archives-wrap" data-aos="{{ $ctx.Site.Params.animation.options.archive.section }}">
    <ul>
      {{- range $paginator -}}
        <li class="archive-article">
          <div class="archive-article-date">
            <span>
              <time
                class="dt-published"
                datetime="{{ .Date }}"
                itemprop="datePublished"
                >{{ .Date.Format $ctx.Site.Params.monthFormat }}</time
              >
            </span>
          </div>
          {{- if .Params.link -}}
            <a
              class="archive-article-title"
              href="{{ .Params.link }}"
              target="_blank"
              itemprop="url"
              rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
              >{{ .Title }}</a
            >
          {{- else if .Title -}}
            <a class="archive-article-title" href="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}"
              >{{ .Title }}</a
            >
          {{- end -}}
        </li>
      {{- end -}}
    </ul>
  </section>
{{- else -}}
{{- range $paginator -}}
  <section class="archives-wrap" data-aos="{{ $ctx.Site.Params.animation.options.archive.section }}">
    <div class="archive-year-wrap">
      <span class="archive-year">{{ .Key }}</span>
    </div>
    <ul>
      {{- range .Pages -}}
        <li class="archive-article">
          <div class="archive-article-date">
            <span>
              <time
                class="dt-published"
                datetime="{{ .Date }}"
                itemprop="datePublished"
                >{{ .Date.Format $ctx.Site.Params.monthFormat }}</time
              >
            </span>
          </div>
          {{- if .Params.link -}}
            <a
              class="archive-article-title"
              href="{{ .Params.link }}"
              target="_blank"
              itemprop="url"
              rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
              >{{ .Title }}</a
            >
          {{- else if .Title -}}
            <a class="archive-article-title" href="{{ .Permalink | relURL }}"
              >{{ .Title }}</a
            >
          {{- end -}}
        </li>
      {{- end -}}
    </ul>
  </section>
{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\loader.html
==================================================

{{- if .Site.Params.preloader.enable -}}
  <div id='loader'>
    <div class="loading-left-bg loading-bg"></div>
    <div class="loading-right-bg loading-bg"></div>
    <div class="spinner-box">
      <div class="loading-taichi {{ if .Site.Params.preloader.rotate }}rotate{{ end }}">
        {{- if .Site.Params.preloader.icon -}}
          <img src="{{ .Site.Params.preloader.icon | relURL }}" alt="loading" />
        {{- else -}}
          <svg width="150" height="150" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" class="icon" version="1.1" xmlns="https://www.w3.org/2000/svg" shape-rendering="geometricPrecision">
            <path d="M303.5 432A80 80 0 0 1 291.5 592A80 80 0 0 1 303.5 432z" fill="var(--red-1, #ff5252)" />
            <path d="M512 65A447 447 0 0 1 512 959L512 929A417 417 0 0 0 512 95A417 417 0 0 0 512 929L512 959A447 447 0 0 1 512 65z 
          M512 95A417 417 0 0 1 929 512A208.5 208.5 0 0 1 720.5 720.5L720.5 592A80 80 0 0 0 720.5 432A80 80 0 0 0 720.5 592L720.5 720.5A208.5 208.5 0 0 1 512 512A208.5 208.5 0 0 0 303.5 303.5A208.5 208.5 0 0 0 95 512A417 417 0 0 1 512 95z" fill="var(--red-1, #ff5252)" />
          </svg>
        {{- end -}}
      </div>
      {{- $languageCode := .Site.Language.LanguageCode -}}
      {{- $text := .Site.Params.preloader.text -}}
      {{- $realText := "" -}}
      {{- if reflect.IsMap $text -}}
        {{- $realText = index $text $languageCode -}}
        {{- if not $realText -}}
          {{- $realText = index $text "en" -}}
        {{- end -}}
      {{- else -}}
        {{- $realText = $text -}}
      {{- end -}}
      <div class="loading-word">{{ $realText }}</div>
    </div>
  </div>
  </div>
  <script>
    var time = null;
    var loaderEl = document.getElementById('loader');
    var startLoading = () => {
      time = Date.now();
      loaderEl.classList.remove("loading");
    }
    var hideLoader = () => {
      document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
      loader.classList.add('loading');
    };

    var endLoading = () => {
      if (!time) {
        hideLoader();
      } else {
        if (Date.now() - time > 500) {
          time = null;
          hideLoader();
        } else {
          setTimeout(endLoading, 500 - (Date.now() - time));
          time = null;
        }
      }
    }
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', endLoading);
    loaderEl.addEventListener('click', endLoading);
  </script>
{{- end -}}

<div id="copy-tooltip"></div>
<div id="lang-tooltip">
{{ i18n "multi_language.not_found" }}
</div>
<div id="heatmap-tooltip"></div>

{{- if .Site.Params.service_worker.enable -}}
  <div class="notification-wrapper">
    <h1>{{ i18n "service_worker.title" }}</h1>
    <p>{{ i18n "service_worker.content" }}</p>
    <div class="notification-btn">
      <button id="notification-update-btn">{{ i18n "service_worker.confirm" }}</button>
      <button id="notification-close-btn">{{ i18n "service_worker.cancel" }}</button>
    </div>
  </div>
{{- end -}}

        {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
      {{- else -}}
        <div class="sidebar-toc-sidebar">
          {{- partial "sidebar/tocBar.html" . -}}
        </div>
        <div class="sidebar-common-sidebar hidden">
          {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
        </div>
      {{- end -}}
    {{- else -}}
      {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
    {{- end -}}
  </div>
  {{- if in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type -}}

    {{- else -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\pagination.html
==================================================

{{- $pag := .Paginator -}}
{{- $tps := $pag.TotalPages -}}

{{- $begin := sub $pag.PageNumber  2 -}}
{{- $end := add $pag.PageNumber  2 -}}

{{- if lt $begin 0 -}}
  {{- $end := sub $end $begin -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $over := sub  $tps $end -}}

{{- if lt $over 0 -}}
  {{- $begin := add $begin $over -}}
{{- end -}}
<nav id="page-nav" aria-label="Pagination navigation" data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.archive.nav }}">
  {{- if $pag.HasPrev -}}
    <a class="extend prev" rel="prev" href="{{ $pag.Prev.URL | relURL }}">
      &laquo;
      {{ i18n "prev" -}}
    </a>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- range $p := $pag.Pagers -}}
    {{- if and (ge $p.PageNumber $begin) (le $p.PageNumber $end) -}}
      {{- if eq $p $pag -}}
        <span class="page-number current">{{ $p.PageNumber }}</span>
      {{- else -}}
        <a class="page-number" href="{{ $p.URL | relURL }}">{{ $p.PageNumber }}</a>
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $pag.HasNext -}}
    <a class="extend next" rel="next" href="{{ $pag.Next.URL | relURL }}">
      {{ i18n "next" }} &raquo;
    </a>
  {{- end -}}
</nav>


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\post.html
==================================================

{{- $page := .page -}}
{{- $index := .index -}}
{{- $ctx := .ctx -}}

<div class="post-wrapper">
  <div
    class="{{ if mod $index 2 }}
      post-wrap right
    {{ else }}
      post-wrap left
    {{ end }}"
    data-aos="{{ $ctx.Site.Params.animation.options.home.post }}"
  >
    {{- if $page.Params.link -}}
      <a
        class="post-link"
        href="{{ $page.Params.link }}"
        itemprop="url"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer"
        aria-label="{{ $page.Title }}"
        title="{{ $page.Title }}"
      >
      </a>
    {{- else -}}
      <a
        class="post-link"
        href="{{ $page.Permalink | relURL }}"
        aria-label="{{ $page.Title }}"
        title="{{ $page.Title }}"
      >
      </a>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and $page.Params.weight (or (eq $ctx.Site.Params.sort_order.home "default") (not $ctx.Site.Params.sort_order.home)) -}}
      <div class="post-sticky">{{ i18n "sticky" }}</div>
    {{- end -}}
    <div
      class="{{ if mod $index 2 }}
        post-cover right
      {{ else }}
        post-cover left
      {{ end }}"
    >
      {{- if and $page.Params.cover (not (hasPrefix $page.Params.cover "rgb")) -}}
        <img
          data-src="{{ $page.Params.cover | relURL }}"
          data-sizes="auto"
          alt="{{ .Title }}"
          class="lazyload"
        />
      {{- else -}}
        {{- $cover := partial "helpers/randomCover.html" $ctx -}}
        {{- if $cover -}}
          <img
            data-src="{{ $cover | relURL }}"
            data-sizes="auto"
            alt="{{ $page.Title }}"
            class="lazyload"
          />
        {{- else -}}
          <img
            data-src="{{ $ctx.Site.Params.banner | relURL }}"
            data-sizes="auto"
            alt="{{ $page.Title }}"
            class="lazyload"
          />
        {{- end -}}
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
    <div class="post-info">
      <div class="post-meta">
        <span
          ><span class="icon-calendar"></span
          >{{ $page.Date.Format $ctx.Site.Params.dateFormat }}</span
        >
        {{- if $ctx.Site.Params.show_update_time -}}
          <span
            ><span class="icon-calendar-plus"></span
            >{{ $page.Lastmod.Format $ctx.Site.Params.dateFormat }}</span
          >
        {{- end -}}
        <span
          ><span class="icon-pencil"></span
          >{{ i18n "post.count" $page.WordCount }}</span
        >
        <span
          ><span class="icon-clock"></span
          >{{ i18n "post.time" $page.ReadingTime }}</span
        >
      </div>
      <h2 class="post-title">{{ $page.Title }}</h2>
      <article class="post-article">
        {{- if $page.Params.description -}}
          {{- $page.Params.description | plainify | truncate 300 -}}
        {{- else if $page.Summary -}}
          {{- $page.Summary  | plainify | truncate 300 -}}
        {{- else -}}
          {{- $page.RawContent | truncate 300 -}}
        {{- end -}}
      </article>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\sidebar.html
==================================================

<aside id="sidebar" aria-label="Sidebar">
  {{- if .Site.Params.injector.sidebar_begin -}}
    {{- .Site.Params.injector.sidebar_begin | safeHTML -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <div class="sidebar-wrapper-container {{ if in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type }}sticky{{ end }}">
  {{- if or (eq .Site.Params.player.position "before_sidebar") (not .Site.Params.player.position) -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.aplayer.enable (not .Site.Params.player.meting.enable) (not .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed) -}}
      <div id="aplayer" theme="var(--color-link)" data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.home.sidebar }}"></div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.meting.enable (not .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed) -}}
      <meting-js
        theme="var(--color-link)"
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.id nil }}id="{{.Site.Params.player.meting.options.id}}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server nil }}server="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type nil }}type="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto nil }}auto="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed nil }}fixed="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay nil }}autoplay="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop nil }}loop="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order nil }}order="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload nil }}preload="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume nil }}volume="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.mutex nil }}mutex="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.mutex }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded nil }}list-folded="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType nil }}lrc-type="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType }}"{{ end -}}
        >
      </meting-js>
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <div class="sidebar-wrapper">
    <div
      class="sidebar-wrap"
      data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.home.sidebar }}"
    >
      {{- if in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type -}}
        {{- if eq .Params.toc false -}}
          {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
        {{- else if and (ne .Params.toc true) (eq .Site.Params.toc false) -}}
          {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
        {{- else -}}
          <div class="sidebar-toc-sidebar">
            {{- partial "sidebar/tocBar.html" . -}}
          </div>
          <div class="sidebar-common-sidebar hidden">
            {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
          </div>
        {{- end -}}
      {{- else -}}
        {{- partialCached "sidebar/commonBar.html" . -}}
      {{- end -}}

      {{- if in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type -}}
        {{- if eq .Params.toc false -}}
        {{- else if and (ne .Params.toc true) (eq .Site.Params.toc false) -}}
        {{- else -}}
          <div class="sidebar-btn-wrapper" style="position:static">
            <div class="sidebar-toc-btn current"></div>
            <div class="sidebar-common-btn"></div>
          </div>
        {{- end -}}
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
  </div>
  {{- if (eq .Site.Params.player.position "after_sidebar") -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.aplayer.enable (not .Site.Params.player.meting.enable) (not .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed) -}}
      <div id="aplayer" class="aplayer-after-sidebar" theme="var(--color-link)" data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.home.sidebar }}"></div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.meting.enable (not .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed) -}}
      <meting-js
        theme="var(--color-link)"
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.id nil }}id="{{.Site.Params.player.meting.options.id}}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server nil }}server="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type nil }}type="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto nil }}auto="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed nil }}fixed="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay nil }}autoplay="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop nil }}loop="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order nil }}order="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload nil }}preload="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume nil }}volume="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.mutex nil }}mutex="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.mutex }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded nil }}list-folded="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType nil }}lrc-type="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType }}"{{ end -}}
        class="aplayer-after-sidebar"
        >
      </meting-js>
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <div class="sidebar-widget">
    {{- if and (not (in .Site.Params.mainSections .Type)) .Site.Params.widgets -}}
      {{- range .Site.Params.widgets -}}
        {{- partialCached (printf "widget/%s.html" .) $ -}}
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
  </div>
  {{- if (eq .Site.Params.player.position "after_widget") -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.aplayer.enable (not .Site.Params.player.meting.enable) (not .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed) -}}
      <div id="aplayer" class="aplayer-after-widget" theme="var(--color-link)" data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.home.sidebar }}"></div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.meting.enable (not .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed) -}}
      <meting-js
        theme="var(--color-link)"
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.id nil }}id="{{.Site.Params.player.meting.options.id}}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server nil }}server="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type nil }}type="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto nil }}auto="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed nil }}fixed="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay nil }}autoplay="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop nil }}loop="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order nil }}order="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload nil }}preload="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume nil }}volume="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.mutex nil }}mutex="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.mutex }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded nil }}list-folded="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.listFolded }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType nil }}lrc-type="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.lrcType }}"{{ end -}}
        class="aplayer-after-widget"
        >
      </meting-js>
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
  </div>
  {{- if .Site.Params.injector.sidebar_end -}}
    {{- .Site.Params.injector.sidebar_end | safeHTML -}}
  {{- end -}}
</aside>

  var _hmt = _hmt || [];
  _hmt.push(["_trackPageview", location.pathname]);
</script>

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\analytics\clarity.html
==================================================

<script>
  (function(c,l,a,r,i,t,y){
      c[a]=c[a]||function(){(c[a].q=c[a].q||[]).push(arguments)};
      t=l.createElement(r);t.async=1;t.src="https://www.clarity.ms/tag/"+i;
      y=l.getElementsByTagName(r)[0];y.parentNode.insertBefore(t,y);
  })(window, document, "clarity", "script", "{{ .Site.Params.clarity }}");
</script>

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\analytics\google.html
==================================================

<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
<script src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id={{ .Site.Params.google_analytics }}"></script>
<script data-pjax>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

  function gtag() {
    dataLayer.push(arguments);
  }

  gtag('js', new Date());

  gtag('config', '{{ .Site.Params.google_analytics }}');
</script>
<!-- End Google Analytics -->

  {{ end }}

{{- $version := int (index (split hugo.Version ".") 1) -}}
{{- if lt $version 124 -}}
  {{- warnf "当前 Hugo 版本小于 0.124.0，请到官方地址下载 Hugo 最新版本：https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases" -}}  
  {{- warnf "Current Hugo version is less then 0.124.0, Please download Hugo latest version on offical site: https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases" -}}  
{{- end -}}

  {{- warnf "Hugo Reimu 主题使用了 SCSS 框架，请到官方地址下载 Hugo Extended 版本：https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases" -}}
