{{- end -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\asyncCss.html
==================================================

{{- $items := . -}}
{{- if not (reflect.IsSlice $items) -}}
  {{- $raw := index $items "raw" -}}
  {{- if reflect.IsMap $raw -}}
    {{- $raw = $raw.src -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- $src := index $items "src" -}}
  {{- $integrity := index $items "integrity" -}}
  <link
    rel="preload"
    as="style"
    href="{{ $src }}"
    {{ if and $integrity (not (hasPrefix $raw "local|")) }}integrity="{{ $integrity }}" crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end -}}
    onload="this.onload=null;this.rel='stylesheet'"
  />
{{- else -}}
  {{- range $items -}}
    <link
      rel="preload"
      as="style"
      href="{{ . }}"
      onload="this.onload=null;this.rel='stylesheet'"
    />
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\css.html
==================================================

{{- $items := . -}}
{{- if not (reflect.IsSlice $items) -}}
  {{- $raw := index $items "raw" -}}
  {{- if reflect.IsMap $raw -}}
    {{- $raw = $raw.src -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- $src := index $items "src" -}}
  {{- $integrity := index $items "integrity" -}}
  <link
    rel="stylesheet"
    href="{{ $src }}"
    {{ if and $integrity (not (hasPrefix $raw "local|")) }}integrity="{{ $integrity }}" crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end -}} />
{{- else -}}
  {{- range $items -}}
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ . }}" />
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\js.html
==================================================

{{- $items := . -}}
{{- if not (reflect.IsSlice $items) -}}
  {{- $raw := index $items "raw" -}}
  {{- if reflect.IsMap $raw -}}
    {{- $raw = $raw.src -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- $src := index $items "src" -}}
  {{- $defer := index $items "defer" -}}
  {{- $async := index $items "async" -}}
  {{- $pjax := index $items "pjax" -}}
  {{- $integrity := index $items "integrity" -}}
  {{- $onload := index $items "onload" -}}
  <script
    src="{{ $src }}"
    {{ if $defer }}defer{{ end -}}
    {{ if $async }}async{{ end -}}
    {{ if $pjax }}data-pjax{{ end -}}
    {{ if $onload }}onload="{{ $onload | safeJS }}"{{ end -}}
    {{ if and $integrity (not (hasPrefix $raw "local|")) }}integrity="{{ $integrity }}" crossorigin="anonymous"{{ end -}}
  ></script>
{{- else -}}
  {{- range $items -}}
    <script src="{{ . }}"></script>
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\randomCover.html
==================================================

{{- $covers := .Site.Data.covers -}}
{{- /* Maintain a shuffled queue so covers only repeat after a full cycle. */ -}}
{{- $scratchKey := "helpers/randomCover/queue" -}}
{{- $queue := .Scratch.Get $scratchKey | default (slice) -}}
{{- if lt (len $queue) 1 -}}
	{{- $queue = shuffle $covers -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- $cover := index $queue 0 -}}
{{- $nextQueue := cond (gt (len $queue) 1) (after 1 $queue) (slice) -}}
{{- .Scratch.Set $scratchKey $nextQueue -}}
{{- return $cover -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\scss.html
==================================================

{{- $source := .source -}}
{{- $temp := .temp -}}
{{- $target := .target -}}
{{- $ctx := .ctx -}}
{{- $scss := resources.Get $source -}}
{{- $scss = $scss | resources.ExecuteAsTemplate $temp $ctx -}}
{{- $css := $scss | toCSS (dict "targetPath" $target "outputStyle" "expanded") -}}
{{- if hugo.IsProduction -}}
  {{- $css = $css | minify | fingerprint -}}
{{- end -}} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $css.RelPermalink }}" />


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\shareLink.html
==================================================

{{- $url := .Permalink -}}
{{- $title := .Title -}}
{{- $source := .Site.BaseURL -}}
{{- $desc := "" -}}
{{- if .Params.description -}}
  {{- $desc = .Params.description | plainify | truncate 300 -}}
{{- else if .Summary -}}
  {{- $desc = .Summary  | plainify | truncate 300 -}}
{{- else -}}
  {{- $desc = .RawContent | truncate 300 -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $shareMap := dict
  "weibo" (printf "https://service.weibo.com/share/share.php?url=%s&appkey=&title=%s&pic=&ralateUid=" $url $title)
  "facebook" (printf "https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=%s" $url)
  "twitter" (printf "https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=%s&text=%s&via=%s" $url $title $source)
  "linkedin" (printf "https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?url=%s&title=%s&summary=%s&mini=true&ro=true" $url $title $desc)
  "reddit" (printf "https://www.reddit.com/submit?url=%s&title=%s" $url $title)
  "qq" (printf "https://connect.qq.com/widget/shareqq/index.html?url=%s&title=%s&desc=%s&source=%s" $url $title $desc $source)
  "weixin" ("javascript:;" | safeURL)  
-}}

{{- return $shareMap -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\ts.html
==================================================

{{- $source := .source -}}
{{- $temp := .source -}}
{{- $pjax := .pjax -}}
{{- $target := .target -}}
{{- $inline := .inline | default true -}}
{{- $ctx := .ctx -}}

{{- with resources.Get $source -}}
  {{- if eq hugo.Environment "development" -}}
  {{- $ts := . | resources.ExecuteAsTemplate $temp $ctx -}}
  {{- $opts := dict "targetPath" $target -}}
    {{- with $ts | js.Build $opts -}}
      {{- if $inline -}}
      <script src="{{ .RelPermalink }}" {{ if $pjax }}data-pjax{{ end }}></script>
      {{- else -}}
        <!-- {{ .RelPermalink }} -->
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- else -}}
  {{- $ts := . | resources.ExecuteAsTemplate $temp $ctx -}}
    {{- $opts := dict "minify" true "targetPath" $target -}}
    {{- with $ts | js.Build $opts -}}
      {{- if $inline -}}
      <script src="{{ .RelPermalink }}" integrity="{{- .Data.Integrity }}" crossorigin="anonymous" {{ if $pjax }}data-pjax{{ end }}></script>
      {{- else -}} 
         <!-- {{ .RelPermalink }} -->
      {{- end -}}
    {{- end -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\vendorCdn.html
==================================================

{{- $items := .item -}}
{{- $site := .ctx -}}
{{- if not (reflect.IsSlice $items) -}}
  {{- $items = slice $items -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- $result := slice -}}
{{- range $items -}}
  {{- $src := . -}}
  {{- if reflect.IsMap . -}}
    {{- $src = .src -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if strings.Contains $src "|" -}}
    {{- $contentToken := split $src "|" -}}
    {{- if ne (len $contentToken) 2 -}}
      {{- errorf "invalid vendor format: %s" $src -}}
    {{- end -}}

    {{- $cdn := index $contentToken 0 -}}
    {{- $path := index $contentToken 1 -}}

    {{- $vendorConfig := index $site.Data.vendor $cdn -}}
    {{- if not $vendorConfig -}}
      {{- errorf "invalid cdn: %s" $src -}}
    {{- end -}}
    {{- $result = $result | append (printf "%s%s" $vendorConfig $path) -}}
  {{- else -}}
    {{- $result = $result | append ($src | absURL) -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- return $result -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\vendorCdnIntegrity.html
==================================================

{{- $items := .item -}}
{{- if not (reflect.IsSlice $items) -}}
  {{- $items = slice $items -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- $result := slice -}}
{{- range $items -}}
  {{- $integrity := false -}}
  {{- if reflect.IsMap . -}}
    {{- $integrity = .integrity -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- $result = $result | append $integrity -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- return $result -}}

==================================================

{{- $custom_basic_font := .Site.Params.custom_font.article -}}
{{- range $custom_basic_font -}}
  <link
    rel="preload"
    as="style"
    crossorigin
    href="{{ .css }}"
    onload="this.rel='stylesheet'"
  />
{{- end -}}

{{- $custom_code_font := .Site.Params.custom_font.code -}}
{{- range $custom_code_font -}}

    rel="preload"
    as="style"
    crossorigin
    href="{{ .css }}"
    onload="this.rel='stylesheet'"
  />
{{- end -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\helpers\vendorGoogleFont.html
==================================================

{{- $fontDisplay := "&display=swap" -}}
{{- $fontStyles := ":400,400italic,700,700italic" -}}
{{- $fontHost := "https://fonts.googleapis.com" -}}

{{- $basicConfigFontFamilies := (.Site.Params.font.article) | append (.Site.Params.font.code) -}}

{{- $fontFamilies := "" -}}
{{- range $index, $element := $basicConfigFontFamilies -}}
  {{- if not $element -}}
    {{- continue -}}
  {{- end -}}
  {{- $fontFamilies = printf "%s%s%s" $fontFamilies $element $fontStyles -}}
  {{- if ne (add $index 1) (len $basicConfigFontFamilies) -}}
    {{- $fontFamilies = printf "%s|" $fontFamilies -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin />
<link
  rel="preload"
  as="style"
  href="{{ printf "%s/css?family=%s%s" $fontHost $fontFamilies $fontDisplay }}"
/>
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="{{ printf "%s/css?family=%s%s" $fontHost $fontFamilies $fontDisplay }}"
  media="print"
  onload="this.media='all'"
/>

  {{- $raw = $raw.src -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- return (hasPrefix $raw "local|") -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\post\comment.html
==================================================

{{- $site := .Site -}}
{{- $params := .Site.Params -}}
{{- $js := .Site.Data.vendor.js -}}

{{- $commentSystems := dict 
  "valine" (cond (and $params.valine.enable $params.valine.appId $params.valine.appKey) true false)
  "waline" (cond (and $params.waline.enable $params.waline.serverURL) true false)
  "twikoo" (cond (and $params.twikoo.enable $params.twikoo.envId) true false)
  "gitalk" (cond (and $params.gitalk.enable $params.gitalk.clientID $params.gitalk.clientSecret) true false)
  "giscus" (cond $params.giscus.enable true false)
  "disqus" (cond (and $params.disqus.enable $params.disqus.shortname) true false)
-}}

{{- $activeSystems := slice -}}
{{- range $key, $value := $commentSystems -}}
  {{- if $value -}}
    {{- $activeSystems = $activeSystems | append $key -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if and (not (eq .Params.comments false)) (len $activeSystems) -}}
<script data-pjax>
  var loadScript = (src, integrity) => {
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = src;
    if (integrity) script.integrity = integrity;
    script.crossOrigin = 'anonymous';
    return script;
  };
  var commentConfigKeys = ['valine', 'waline', 'twikoo', 'gitalk', 'giscus', 'disqus'];
  var commentConfig = {
    {{- if $commentSystems.valine -}}
    valine: {
      enable: {{ if and $params.valine.enable $params.valine.appId $params.valine.appKey }}true{{ else }}false{{ end }},
      load: () => {
        const container = document.querySelector('.valine-comment');
        if (!container) return;
        if (container.style.display === 'block') return; // already loaded
        container.style.display = 'block';

        const script = loadScript(
          '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.valine "ctx" $site)) 0 }}',
          !'{{ $js.valine.src }}'.startsWith('local') ? '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.valine)) 0 }}' : undefined
        );
        script.onload = () => {
          const GUEST_INFO = ['nick', 'mail', 'link'];
          const guest_info = '{{ $params.valine.guest_info }}'.split(',').filter((item) => {
            return GUEST_INFO.indexOf(item) > -1
          });
          const recordIP = JSON.parse('{{ $params.valine.recordIP }}');
          const highlight = JSON.parse('{{ $params.valine.highlight }}');
          const visitor = JSON.parse('{{ $params.valine.visitor }}');
          const serverURLs = {{ if $params.valine.serverURLs }}'{{ $params.valine.serverURLs }}'{{ else }}undefined{{ end }};

          new Valine({
            el: '.valine-comment',
            appId: "{{ $params.valine.appId }}",
            appKey: "{{ $params.valine.appKey }}",
            placeholder: "{{ $params.valine.placeholder }}",
            pageSize: '{{ $params.valine.pageSize }}',
            avatar: '{{ $params.valine.avatar }}',
            lang: document.documentElement.lang || 'en',
            recordIP: recordIP,
            highlight: highlight,
            visitor: visitor,
            requiredFields: guest_info,
            path: window.location.pathname,
            serverURLs,
          });
        };
        document.head.appendChild(script);
      }
    },
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if $commentSystems.waline -}}
    waline: {
      enable: {{ if and $params.waline.enable $params.waline.serverURL }}true{{ else }}false{{ end }},
      load: async () => {
        const container = document.querySelector('.waline-comment');
        if (!container) return;
        container.style.display = 'block';

        let walineInit;
        const walineCdn = '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.waline "ctx" $site)) 0 }}';
        
        if ('{{ $js.waline.src }}'.startsWith('local')) {
          // 本地资源不使用 integrity
          const module = await safeImport(walineCdn);
          walineInit = module.init;
        } else {
          // 远程资源使用 integrity
          const module = await safeImport(
            walineCdn, 
            '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.waline "ctx" $site)) 0 }}'
          );
          walineInit = module.init;
        }
        
        window.walineInstance = walineInit({
          el: '.waline-comment',
          serverURL: '{{ $params.waline.serverURL }}',
          lang: document.documentElement.lang || 'en',
          locale: JSON.parse({{ $params.waline.locale | jsonify }}),
          emoji: JSON.parse({{ $params.waline.emoji | jsonify}}),
          meta: JSON.parse({{ $params.waline.meta | jsonify }}),
          requiredMeta: JSON.parse({{ $params.waline.requiredMeta | jsonify }}),
          wordLimit: {{ $params.waline.wordLimit }},
          comment: true,
          pageSize: {{ $params.waline.pageSize }},
          dark: 'html[data-theme="dark"]',
          pageview: {{ $params.waline.pageview }},
        });
      }
    },
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if $commentSystems.twikoo -}}
    twikoo: {
      enable: {{ if and $params.twikoo.enable $params.twikoo.envId }}true{{ else }}false{{ end }},
      load: () => {
        const container = document.querySelector('.twikoo-comment');
        if (!container) return;
        container.style.display = 'block';

        // 加载 Twikoo 脚本
        const script = loadScript(
          '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.twikoo "ctx" $site)) 0 }}',
          !'{{ $js.twikoo.src }}'.startsWith('local') ? '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.twikoo)) 0 }}' : undefined
        );
        script.onload = () => {
          twikoo.init({
            envId: '{{ $params.twikoo.envId }}',
            el: '.twikoo-comment',
            region: '{{ $params.twikoo.region }}',
            lang: document.documentElement.lang || 'en',
          });
          twikoo.getCommentsCount({
            envId: '{{ .Site.Params.twikoo.envId }}',
            region: '{{ .Site.Params.twikoo.region }}',
            urls: [
              '{{ .Permalink | urlize }}'
            ],
            includeReply: false
          }).then((res) => {
            document.querySelector('.twikoo-comment-count').innerText = res[0].count;
          }).catch((err) => {
            console.error(err);
          });
        };
        document.head.appendChild(script);
      }
    },
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if $commentSystems.gitalk -}}
    gitalk: {
      enable: {{ if and $params.gitalk.enable $params.gitalk.clientID $params.gitalk.clientSecret }}true{{ else }}false{{ end }},
      load: () => {
        const container = document.querySelector('.gitalk-comment');
        if (!container) return;
        container.style.display = 'block';

        const script = loadScript(
          '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.gitalk "ctx" $site)) 0 }}',
          !'{{ $js.gitalk.src }}'.startsWith('local') ? '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.gitalk)) 0 }}' : undefined
        );
        script.onload = () => {
          if ({{ $params.gitalk.md5 }}) {
            // 如果需要 md5，加载 md5 脚本
            const md5Script = loadScript(
              '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdn.html" (dict "item" $js.md5 "ctx" $site)) 0 }}',
              !'{{ $js.md5.src }}'.startsWith('local') ? '{{ index (partial "helpers/vendorCdnIntegrity.html" (dict "item" $js.md5)) 0 }}' : undefined
            );
            md5Script.onload = initGitalk;
            document.head.appendChild(md5Script);
          } else {
            // 否则直接初始化 Gitalk
            initGitalk();
          }
        };
        document.head.appendChild(script);

        function initGitalk() {
          let gitalk = new Gitalk({
            clientID: '{{ $params.gitalk.clientID }}',
            clientSecret: '{{ $params.gitalk.clientSecret}}',
            repo: '{{ $params.gitalk.repo }}',
            owner: '{{ $params.gitalk.owner }}',
            admin: JSON.parse({{ $params.gitalk.admin | jsonify }}),
            id: {{ if $params.gitalk.md5 }}window.md5 ? window.md5(location.pathname) : location.pathname{{ else }}location.pathname{{ end }},
            distractionFreeMode: false,
            language: document.documentElement.lang || 'en',
          });
          gitalk.render('gitalk-comment');
        }
      }
    },
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if $commentSystems.giscus -}}
    giscus: {
      enable: {{ if and $params.giscus.enable }}true{{ else }}false{{ end }},
      load: () => {
        const container = document.querySelector('.giscus-comment');
        if (!container) return;
        container.style.display = 'block';

        // 删除可能已存在的 giscus 脚本和 iframe
        const existingScript = container.querySelector('script[src*="giscus.app/client.js"]');
        if (existingScript) existingScript.remove();
        const existingFrame = document.querySelector('iframe.giscus-frame');
        if (existingFrame) existingFrame.remove();

        // 加载 Giscus 脚本
        const giscusScript = document.createElement('script');
        const domMode = document.documentElement.getAttribute("data-theme");

        const docLang = document.documentElement.lang || 'en';
        const langBase = docLang.split('-')[0];
        const supportedLangs = ['ar', 'be', 'bg', 'ca', 'cs', 'da', 'de', 'en', 
        'eo', 'es', 'eu', 'fa', 'fr', 'gr', 'hbs', 'he', 'hu', 'id', 'it', 'ja', 
        'kh', 'ko', 'nl', 'pl', 'pt', 'ro', 'ru', 'th', 'tr', 'uk', 'uz', 'vi', 'zh-CN', 'zh-HK', 'zh-TW'];
        const giscusLang = supportedLangs.includes(docLang) ? docLang : supportedLangs.includes(langBase) ? langBase : 'en';

        giscusScript.src = 'https://giscus.app/client.js';
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-repo', '{{ $params.giscus.repo }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-repo-id', '{{ $params.giscus.repoId }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-category', '{{ $params.giscus.category }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-category-id', '{{ $params.giscus.categoryId }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-mapping', '{{ $params.giscus.strict }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-strict', '{{ $params.giscus.strict }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-reactions-enabled', '{{ $params.giscus.reactionsEnabled }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-emit-metadata', '{{ $params.giscus.emitMetadata }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-input-position', '{{ $params.giscus.inputPosition }}');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-theme', domMode === 'dark' ? 'dark' : 'light');
        giscusScript.setAttribute('data-lang', giscusLang);
        giscusScript.setAttribute('crossorigin', 'anonymous');
        giscusScript.async = true;
        container.appendChild(giscusScript);
        document.body.addEventListener('light-theme-set', () => {
          const iframe = document.querySelector('iframe.giscus-frame');
          if (!iframe) return;
          iframe.contentWindow.postMessage({ giscus: { setConfig: { theme: 'light' } } }, 'https://giscus.app');
        });
        document.body.addEventListener('dark-theme-set', () => {
          const iframe = document.querySelector('iframe.giscus-frame');
          if (!iframe) return;
          iframe.contentWindow.postMessage({ giscus: { setConfig: { theme: 'dark' } } }, 'https://giscus.app');
        });
      }
    },
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if $commentSystems.disqus -}}
    disqus: {
      enable: {{ if and $params.disqus.enable $params.disqus.shortname }}true{{ else }}false{{ end }},
      load: () => {
        {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
        // since disqus cannot parse color(srgb), we need to rewrite div#disqus_thread style
        function fixDisqusColorParse() {
          const disqusDiv = _$("#disqus_thread"); 
          if (!disqusDiv) return;
          const a = document.createElement('a');
          a.style.display = 'none';
          disqusDiv.appendChild(a);
          const computedStyle = getComputedStyle(a);
          const color = computedStyle.color;
          // remove the temporary element
          disqusDiv.removeChild(a);
          if (!color.startsWith('color(srgb')) return;
          // convert to rgb
          function linearToSrgb(c) {
            if (c <= 0.0031308) {
              return 12.92 * c; 
            } else {
              return 1.055 * Math.pow(c, 1/2.4) - 0.055;
            }
          }

          function srgbToRgb(srgb) {
            return srgb.map(c => Math.round(linearToSrgb(c) * 255));
          }
          const rgbValues = color.match(/color\(srgb ([0-9.]+) ([0-9.]+) ([0-9.]+)\)/);
          let styleEl = null;
          if (rgbValues && rgbValues.length === 4) {
            const srgb = [
              parseFloat(rgbValues[1]),
              parseFloat(rgbValues[2]),
              parseFloat(rgbValues[3])
            ];
            const rgb = srgbToRgb(srgb);
            // create style element to override disqus styles
            styleEl = document.createElement('style');
            styleEl.innerHTML = `
              #disqus_thread a { color: rgb(${rgb[0]}, ${rgb[1]}, ${rgb[2]}) !important; }
            `;
            document.head.appendChild(styleEl);
          }
          return () => {
            // remove the style element
            if (styleEl) {
              document.head.removeChild(styleEl);
            }
          }
        }
        {{- end -}}
        if (window.DISQUS) {
          {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
          const cleanup = fixDisqusColorParse();
          {{- end -}}
          DISQUS.reset({
            reload: true
          });
          {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
          cleanup?.();
          {{- end -}}
        } else {
          {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
          const cleanup = fixDisqusColorParse();
          {{- end -}}
          const script = document.createElement('script');
          script.src = 'https://{{- $params.disqus.shortname -}}.disqus.com/embed.js';
          script.setAttribute('data-timestamp', +new Date());
          {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
          script.onload = () => {
            cleanup?.();
          };
          {{- end -}}
          (document.head || document.body).appendChild(script);
          document.body.addEventListener('light-theme-set', () => {
            setTimeout(() => {
              {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
              const cleanup = fixDisqusColorParse();
              {{- end -}}
              window?.DISQUS?.reset({
                reload: true
              });
              {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
              cleanup?.();
              {{- end -}}
            }, 500);
          });
          document.body.addEventListener('dark-theme-set', () => {
            setTimeout(() => {
              {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
              const cleanup = fixDisqusColorParse();
              {{- end -}}
              window?.DISQUS?.reset({
                reload: true
              });
              {{- if $params.material_theme.enable -}}
              cleanup?.();
              {{- end -}}
            }, 500);
          });
        }
        {{- if $params.disqus.count -}}
          if (_$("#disqus-count")) {
            const url = new URL(location.href);
            _$("#disqus-count").href = url.origin + url.pathname + '#disqus_thread';
          }
          if (window.DISQUSWIDGETS) {
            DISQUSWIDGETS.getCount({ reset: true });
          } else {
            const countScript = document.createElement('script');
            countScript.src = 'https://{{- $params.disqus.shortname -}}.disqus.com/count.js';
            countScript.id = 'dsq-count-scr';
            (document.head || document.body).appendChild(countScript);
          }
        {{- end -}}
      }
    }
    {{- end -}}
  };
  commentConfig.enable = commentConfigKeys.some(key => commentConfig?.[key]?.enable);

  var defaultComment = '';
  if (commentConfig.enable) {
    // 1. 首先检查localStorage中是否有保存的评论类型
    var savedCommentType = localStorage.getItem('commentType');
    
    // 2. 如果localStorage中有值且对应的评论系统可用，就使用它
    if (savedCommentType) {
      if (commentConfig[savedCommentType]?.enable) {
        defaultComment = savedCommentType;
      }
    }
    
    // 3. 如果localStorage无效，检查配置的默认评论系统
    if (!defaultComment) {
      var configDefault = '{{ $params.comment.default }}';
      if (commentConfig[configDefault]?.enable) {
        defaultComment = configDefault;
      }
    }
    
    // 4. 如果前两项都无效，按指定顺序找到第一个可用的评论系统
    if (!defaultComment) {
      defaultComment = commentConfigKeys.find(sys => commentConfig?.[sys]?.enable) || '';
    }
  }

  function loadComments() {
    if (!commentConfig.enable) return;
    // 评论组件加载状态跟踪
    const loadedComments = {
      valine: false,
      waline: false,
      twikoo: false,
      gitalk: false,
      giscus: false
    };

    // 隐藏所有评论容器
    const hideAllComments = () => {
      const commentContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.comment');
      commentContainers.forEach(container => {
        container.style.display = 'none';
      });
    };

    // 按需加载评论系统
    const loadCommentSystem = (type) => {
      if (loadedComments[type]) {
        // 如果已加载，只需显示对应容器
        document.querySelector(`.${type}-comment`).style.display = 'block';
        return;
      }

      // 根据类型加载对应的脚本
      commentConfig[type]?.load();
      loadedComments[type] = true;
    };

    // 评论组件选择器
    const changeActiveCommentItems = (item) => {
      const commentItems = document.querySelectorAll('.selector-item');
      for (let i = 0; i < commentItems.length; i++) {
        commentItems[i].classList.remove('active');
      }
      item.classList.add('active');

      // 获取要加载的评论系统类型
      const commentType = item.getAttribute('data-selector');

      // 隐藏所有评论系统
      hideAllComments();

      // 加载选中的评论系统
      loadCommentSystem(commentType);
    };

    const commentInit = () => {
      // 评论组件选择器点击事件
      const commentItems = document.querySelectorAll('.selector-item');
      for (let item of commentItems) {
        item.addEventListener('click', () => {
          // 保存选择器状态
          const commentType = item.getAttribute('data-selector');
          window.localStorage.setItem('commentType', commentType);
          // 切换选中状态
          changeActiveCommentItems(item);
        });
      }

      // 检查是否需要加载默认评论系统
      if (defaultComment) {
        const defaultSelectorItem = document.querySelector(`[data-selector="${defaultComment}"]`);
        if (!defaultSelectorItem) return;
        defaultSelectorItem.style.display = 'block';
        defaultSelectorItem.classList.add('active');
        loadCommentSystem(defaultComment);
      }
    }

    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', commentInit);
    } else {
      commentInit();
    }
  };
  loadComments();
</script>
{{- end -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\post\copyright.html
==================================================

{{- $articleCopyright := .Site.Params.article_copyright -}}
{{- $author := .Params.author | default .Site.Params.author -}}
{{- $title := .Site.Title -}}
{{- $permalink := .Permalink -}}
{{- $date := .Date.Format .Site.Params.timeFormat -}}
{{- $updated := .Lastmod.Format .Site.Params.timeFormat -}}

<blockquote class="article-copyright">
  {{- if $articleCopyright.content.author -}}
    <p><strong><span class="icon-user icon"></span>{{ i18n "article_copyright.author" }}</strong>{{ $author }}</p>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $articleCopyright.content.link -}}
    <p>
      <strong><span class="icon-link icon"></span>{{ i18n "article_copyright.permalink" }}</strong><a href="{{ $permalink }}">{{ $permalink }}</a>
    </p>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $articleCopyright.content.title -}}
    <p><strong><span class="icon-pencil icon"></span>{{ i18n "article_copyright.title" }}</strong>{{ .Title }}</p>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $articleCopyright.content.date -}}
    <p><strong><span class="icon-calendar icon"></span>{{ i18n "article_copyright.date" }}</strong>{{ $date }}</p>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $articleCopyright.content.updated -}}
    <p><strong><span class="icon-calendar icon"></span>{{ i18n "article_copyright.updated" }}</strong>{{ $updated }}</p>
  {{- end -}}
  {{- if $articleCopyright.content.license -}}
    <p>
      {{ $licenseDom := printf "<a href=\"https://creativecommons.org/licenses/%s/4.0/deed.zh\" rel=\"noopener nofollow noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"><span class=\"icon-creative-commons\"></span>%s</a>" $articleCopyright.content.license_type ($articleCopyright.content.license_type | upper) }}
      <strong><span class="icon-copyright icon"></span>{{ i18n "article_copyright.license" }}</strong>
      {{ i18n "article_copyright.license_content" $licenseDom | safeHTML }}
    </p>
    <span class="icon-creative-commons article-copyright-bg"></span>
  {{- end -}}
</blockquote>

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\post\date.html

<div class="article-date">
  <span
    class="article-date-link icon-calendar"
    data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.date }}"
  >
    <time datetime="{{ .Date }}" itemprop="datePublished"
      >{{ .Date.Format .Site.Params.dateFormat }}</time
    >
    <time style="display: none;" id="post-update-time"
      >{{ .Lastmod.Format .Site.Params.dateFormat }}</time
    >
  </span>
  {{- if .Site.Params.show_update_time -}}
    <span
      class="article-date-link icon-calendar-plus"
      data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.date }}"
    >
      <time datetime="{{ .Lastmod }}" itemprop="dateModified"
        >{{ .Lastmod.Format .Site.Params.dateFormat }}</time
      >
    </span>
  {{- end -}}
</div>

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\post\gallery.html

{{- if and .Params.photos (len .Params.photos) -}}
  <div class="article-gallery">
    <div class="article-gallery-photos">
      {{- range .Params.photos -}}
        <a class="article-gallery-img article-gallery-item" href="{{ . | relURL }}" target="_blank">
          <img src="{{ . | relURL }}" itemprop="image" alt="gallery" onload="this.parentNode.dataset.pswpWidth = this.naturalWidth;this.parentNode.dataset.pswpHeight = this.naturalHeight;" >
        </a>
      {{- end -}}
    </div>
  </div>
{{- end -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\partials\post\nav.html
==================================================

{{- if or .PrevInSection .NextInSection -}}
  <nav
    id="article-nav"
    aria-label="Article navigation"
    data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.article.nav }}"
  >
    {{- if .PrevInSection -}}
      <div class="article-nav-link-wrap left">
        {{- if and .PrevInSection.Params.cover (not (strings.HasPrefix .PrevInSection.Params.cover "rgb")) -}}
          <img
            data-src="{{ .PrevInSection.Params.cover | relURL }}"
            data-sizes="auto"
            alt="{{ .PrevInSection.Title }}"
            class="lazyload"
          />
        {{- else -}}
          {{- $covers := partial "helpers/randomCover.html" . -}}
          {{- if $covers -}}
            <img
              data-src="{{ $covers | relURL }}"
              data-sizes="auto"
              alt="{{ .PrevInSection.Title }}"
              class="lazyload"
            />
          {{- else -}}
            <img
              data-src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}"
              data-sizes="auto"
              alt="{{ .PrevInSection.Title }}"
              class="lazyload"
            />
          {{- end -}}
        {{- end -}}
        <a
          href="{{ .PrevInSection.Permalink | relURL }}"
          aria-label="{{ i18n "newer" }}: {{- if .PrevInSection.Title -}}
            {{- .PrevInSection.Title -}}
          {{- else -}}
            (no title)
          {{- end -}}"
          title="{{ i18n "newer" }}: {{- if .PrevInSection.Title -}}
            {{- .PrevInSection.Title -}}
          {{- else -}}
            (no title)
          {{- end -}}"
        ></a>
        <div class="article-nav-caption">{{ i18n "newer" }}</div>
        <h3 class="article-nav-title">
          {{- if .PrevInSection.Title -}}
            {{- .PrevInSection.Title -}}
          {{- else -}}
            (no title)
          {{- end -}}
        </h3>
      </div>
    {{- end -}}

    {{- if .NextInSection -}}
      <div class="article-nav-link-wrap right">
        {{- if and .NextInSection.Params.cover (not (strings.HasPrefix .NextInSection.Params.cover "rgb")) -}}
          <img
            data-src="{{ .NextInSection.Params.cover | relURL }}"
            data-sizes="auto"
            alt="{{ .NextInSection.Title }}"
            class="lazyload"
          />
        {{- else -}}
          {{- $covers := partial "helpers/randomCover.html" . -}}
          {{- if $covers -}}
            <img
              data-src="{{ $covers | relURL }}"
              data-sizes="auto"
              alt="{{ .NextInSection.Title }}"
              class="lazyload"
            />
          {{- else -}}
            <img
              data-src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}"
              data-sizes="auto"
              alt="{{ .NextInSection.Title }}"
              class="lazyload"
            />
          {{- end -}}
        {{- end -}}
        <a
          href="{{ .NextInSection.Permalink | relURL }}"
          aria-label="{{ i18n "older" }}: {{- if .NextInSection.Title -}}
            {{- .NextInSection.Title -}}
          {{- else -}}
            (no title)
          {{- end -}}"
          title="{{ i18n "older" }}: {{- if .NextInSection.Title -}}
            {{- .NextInSection.Title -}}
          {{- else -}}
            (no title)
          {{- end -}}"
        ></a>
        <div class="article-nav-caption">{{ i18n "older" }}</div>
        <h3 class="article-nav-title">
          {{- if .NextInSection.Title -}}
            {{- .NextInSection.Title -}}
          {{- else -}}
            (no title)
          {{- end -}}
        </h3>
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
  </nav>
{{- end -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\gallery.html
==================================================

{{- $content := .Inner | .Page.RenderString -}}
{{- $galleryId := printf "photoWall-%s" (substr (md5 .Inner) 0 9) -}}

{{- $imageUrls := slice -}}
{{- range findRE `<img[^>]+src=["']([^"']+)["'][^>]*>` $content -}}
  {{- $match := . | findRE `src=["']([^"']+)["']` -}}
  {{- if $match -}}
    {{- $url := index $match 0 | replaceRE `src=["'](.+)["']` "$1" -}}
    {{- $imageUrls = $imageUrls | append $url -}}
  {{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

<div class="gallery-wall" id="{{ $galleryId }}"></div>
<script>
  (function() {
    const imageUrls = JSON.parse({{ $imageUrls | jsonify }});
    let images = [];
    const wallId = '#{{ $galleryId }}';
    let resizeTimer;
    let lastWidth = 0;
    
    function init() {
      createInitialDOM();
      loadImages();
      const wall = _$(wallId);
      if (wall && window.ResizeObserver) {
        const observer = new ResizeObserver((entries) => {
          const newWidth = entries[0].contentRect.width;
          if (Math.abs(newWidth - lastWidth) > 1) {
            clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
            resizeTimer = setTimeout(renderPhotoWall, 250);
          }
        });
        observer.observe(wall);
      } else {
        window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize);
      }
    }
    
    function createInitialDOM() {
      const wall = _$(wallId);
      if (!wall || !imageUrls.length) return;
      
      wall.style.opacity = '0';
      wall.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
      
      imageUrls.forEach((url) => {
        images.push({
          width: 800,
          height: 600,
          aspectRatio: 4/3,
          url: url,
          loaded: false
        });
      });
      
      renderPhotoWall();
    }
    
    function loadImages() {
      const loadPromises = imageUrls.map((url, index) => {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
          const img = new Image();
          img.onload = () => {
            if (images[index]) {
              images[index].width = img.naturalWidth;
              images[index].height = img.naturalHeight;
              images[index].aspectRatio = img.naturalWidth / img.naturalHeight;
              images[index].loaded = true;
            }
            resolve();
          };
          img.onerror = () => {
            if (images[index]) {
              images[index].loaded = true;
            }
            resolve();
          };
          img.src = url;
        });
      });
      
      Promise.all(loadPromises)
        .then(() => {
          const wall = _$(wallId);
          if (wall) {
            wall.style.opacity = '1';
            wall.style.pointerEvents = 'auto';
            wall.style.transition = 'opacity 0.3s ease';
          }
          renderPhotoWall();
        })
        .catch((error) => console.error("图片加载失败:", error));
    }
    
    function renderPhotoWall() {
      const wall = _$(wallId);
      
      if (!images.length || !wall) return;
      
      const screenWidth = wall.offsetWidth || window.innerWidth - 40;
      lastWidth = screenWidth;
      
      wall.innerHTML = "";
      const rowHeight = 200;
      const gap = 10;
      const maxPerRow = 4;
      
      let row = [];
      let rowWidth = 0;
      const rows = [];
      
      images.forEach((img) => {
        const scaledWidth = rowHeight * img.aspectRatio;
        
        if (rowWidth + scaledWidth <= screenWidth && row.length < maxPerRow) {
          row.push(img);
          rowWidth += scaledWidth + gap;
        } else {
          if (row.length) rows.push(row);
          row = [img];
          rowWidth = scaledWidth + gap;
        }
      });
      
      if (row.length) rows.push(row);
      
      rows.forEach((row) => {
        const rowDiv = document.createElement("div");
        rowDiv.style.cssText = `display: flex; gap: ${gap}px; width: 100%`;
        
        row.forEach((img) => {
          const item = document.createElement("div");
          item.className = "photo-item";
          const flex = row.length === 1 ? '1' : img.aspectRatio;
          item.style.cssText = `flex: ${flex}; height: ${rowHeight}px`;
          
          const imgEl = document.createElement("img");
          imgEl.alt = "Gallery Image";
          imgEl.style.cssText = "width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover";
          imgEl.className = "lazyload";
          imgEl.dataset.src = img.url;
          imgEl.dataset.sizes = "auto";

          const link = document.createElement("a");
          link.href = img.url;
          link.dataset.pswpWidth = img.width;
          link.dataset.pswpHeight = img.height;
          link.target = "_blank";
          link.className = "article-gallery-item";
          link.style.cssText = "width: 100%; height: 100%";
          link.appendChild(imgEl);
          
          item.appendChild(link);
          rowDiv.appendChild(item);
        });
        
        wall.appendChild(rowDiv);
      });
    }
    
    function handleResize() {
      clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
      resizeTimer = setTimeout(renderPhotoWall, 250);
    }
    
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', init);
    } else {
      init();
    }
  })();
</script>

{{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/gallery.scss" "temp" "gallery.scss" "target" "css/gallery.css" "ctx" .) -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\grid.html
==================================================

{{- $width := 240 -}}
{{- with .Get "width" -}}
	{{- $val := int . -}}
	{{- if gt $val 0 -}}
		{{- $width = $val -}}
	{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- $columns := 0 -}}
{{- with .Get "col" -}}
	{{- $val := int . -}}
	{{- if gt $val 0 -}}
		{{- $columns = $val -}}
	{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $raw := .Inner -}}
{{- $normalized := replaceRE `<!--\s*cell\s*-->` `<!--cell-->` $raw -}}
{{- $parts := split $normalized "<!--cell-->" -}}
{{- $cells := slice -}}
{{- range $parts -}}
	{{- $trimmed := trim . " \t\r\n" -}}
	{{- if gt (len $trimmed) 0 -}}
		{{- $cells = $cells | append $trimmed -}}
	{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- if eq (len $cells) 0 -}}
	{{- $cells = slice (trim .Inner " \t\r\n") -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $gridClass := printf "grid-container-%d" $width -}}
{{- if gt $columns 0 -}}
	{{- $gridClass = printf "%s-col-%d" $gridClass $columns -}}
{{- end -}}
{{- $gridStyle := printf "grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(%dpx, 1fr));" $width -}}
{{- if gt $columns 0 -}}
	{{- $gridStyle = printf "grid-template-columns: repeat(%d, 1fr);" $columns -}}
{{- end -}}

<div class="reimu-grid {{ $gridClass }}" style="{{ $gridStyle | safeCSS }}">
	{{- range $cells -}}
		<div class="grid-cell">{{ . | markdownify }}</div>
	{{- end -}}
</div>

{{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/grid.scss" "temp" "grid.scss" "target" "css/grid.css" "ctx" .) -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\heatMapCard.html
==================================================

{{- $levelStandard := .Get "levelStandard" | default "1000,5000,10000" -}}

{{- $currentPath := .Page.File.Path -}}
{{- $articlesData := slice -}}
{{- $dateFormat := $.Site.Params.dateFormat | default "2006-01-02" -}}
{{- range where .Site.RegularPages "File.Path" "ne" $currentPath -}}
  {{- $rawContent := .RawContent -}}
  {{- $postLinkCardPattern := `\{\{<\s*postLinkCard.*?>\}\}` -}}
  {{- $linkPattern := `\{\{<\s*link.*?>\}\}` -}}
  {{- $heatMapCardPattern := `\{\{<\s*heatMapCard.*?>\}\}` -}}

  {{- $step1 := replaceRE $postLinkCardPattern "" $rawContent -}}
  {{- $step2 := replaceRE $linkPattern "" $step1 -}}
  {{- $cleanContent := replaceRE $heatMapCardPattern "" $step2 -}}
  {{- $articlesData = $articlesData | append (dict
    "title" .Title
    "date" ( .Date | time.Format $dateFormat )
    "lastmod" ( .Lastmod | time.Format $dateFormat )
    "wordcount" ($cleanContent | $.Page.RenderString | string | countwords)
    "url" .RelPermalink
    )
  -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/heat-map.scss" "temp" "heat-map.scss" "target" "css/heat-map.css" "ctx" .) -}}
<div id="heatmap"></div>
<script>
var MONTH_NAMES = [
  "Jan",
  "Feb",
  "Mar",
  "Apr",
  "May",
  "Jun",
  "Jul",
  "Aug",
  "Sep",
  "Oct",
  "Nov",
  "Dec",
];

var pluralize = (num, word) => (`${num} ${word}${num <= 1 ? '' : 's'}`);

function getTooltip(contributionDay, contributionDate) {
  // 修正日期转换逻辑，确保日期一致
  const formattedDate = new Date(
    contributionDate.getTime() - contributionDate.getTimezoneOffset() * 60000,
  )
    .toISOString()
    .split("T")[0];

  if (contributionDay.count === 0) {
    return `No writing on ${formattedDate}`;
  }

  const postText = pluralize(contributionDay.post, "post");
  const wordText = pluralize(contributionDay.count, "word");

  return `${postText} ${wordText} on ${formattedDate}`;
}

// 全局tooltip元素
var heatmapTooltip = document.getElementById("heatmap-tooltip");

function hideTooltip() {
  heatmapTooltip.style.display = 'none';
}

function tileClickHandler(event) {
  const tile = event.target;
  if (!tile.classList.contains("tile")) return;
  
  const date = new Date(Number(tile.dataset.date));
  const dateStr = date.toISOString().split('T')[0];
  
  // 获取当天的文章列表
  const articles = articleStats.filter(article => article.date === dateStr);
  
  const level = tile.dataset.level;
  const formattedDate = date.toLocaleDateString();
  let totalWords = 0;
  
  let html = `
    <div class="tooltip-header">
      <div class="tooltip-header-content">${formattedDate} (Level ${level})</div>
      <div class="popup-btn-close tooltip-close"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="tooltip-content">
      <ul>
  `;

  if (articles.length === 0) {
    html += `<li>{{- i18n "heat_map_card.no_articles" -}}</li>`;
  } else {
    articles.forEach(article => {
      totalWords += article.wordcount;
      html += `<li><a href="${article.url}">${article.title}</a> (${article.wordcount} {{ i18n "heat_map_card.words" -}})</li>`;
    });
  }

  const footerTemplate = {{- i18n "heat_map_card.total_articles" -}}.replace("$1", articles.length).replace("$2", totalWords);
  
  html += `
      </ul>
      <div class="tooltip-footer">
        ${footerTemplate}
      </div>
    </div>
  `;
  
  // 设置内容并显示tooltip
  heatmapTooltip.innerHTML = html;
  
  // 计算位置 - 默认显示在tile右侧
  const rect = tile.getBoundingClientRect();
  heatmapTooltip.style.display = 'block';
  heatmapTooltip.style.visibility = 'hidden';
  heatmapTooltip.style.left = '0px';

  // 获取实际的tooltip宽度
  const tooltipRect = heatmapTooltip.getBoundingClientRect();
  const tooltipWidth = tooltipRect.width;
  
  // 检查右侧空间是否足够，否则显示在左侧
  let left = rect.right + 10;
  if (left + tooltipWidth > window.innerWidth) {
    left = rect.left - tooltipWidth - 10;
  }
  
  heatmapTooltip.style.left = `${left}px`;
  heatmapTooltip.style.top = `${rect.top}px`;
  heatmapTooltip.style.display = 'block';
  heatmapTooltip.style.visibility = 'visible';
  
  // 添加关闭按钮事件监听

  const closeBtn = heatmapTooltip.querySelector('.tooltip-close');
  if (closeBtn) {
    closeBtn.addEventListener('click', hideTooltip);
  }
  
  // 点击其他地方关闭tooltip
  document.addEventListener('click', function closeTooltipOnClickOutside(e) {
    if (e.target.classList.contains('tile')) {
      return;
    }
    if (!heatmapTooltip.contains(e.target) && e.target !== tile) {
      hideTooltip();
      document.removeEventListener('click', closeTooltipOnClickOutside);
    }
  });
}

function createCalendar(element, contributionData) {
  if (!element) {
    return;
  }
  element.innerHTML = `
    <div class="outer-box">
      <div class="year-select"></div>
      <div class="inner-box">
        <div class="calendar-container">
          ${["Mon", "Wed", "Fri"].map((t) => `<span class="week">${t}</span>`).join("")}
          <div class="legend">Less${new Array(5)
            .fill(0)
            .map((_, i) => `<i class="tile" data-level="${i}"></i>`)
            .join("")}More</div>
          <div class="tiles"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  `;

  const calendarContainer = element.querySelector(".calendar-container");
  const yearSelector = element.querySelector(".year-select");
  const tilesContainer = element.querySelector(".tiles");

  const allContributionData = completeContributionData(contributionData);
  const currentDisplayYear = new Date().getFullYear();

  yearSelector.innerHTML = Object.keys(allContributionData)
    .sort((a, b) => b - a)
    .map(
      (year) =>
        `<div class="year-option ${year == currentDisplayYear ? "active" : ""}">${year}</div>`,
    )
    .join("");

  yearSelector.addEventListener("click", ({ target }) => {
    if (target.classList.contains("year-option")) {
      element.querySelector(".active")?.classList.remove("active");
      target.classList.add("active");
      generateYearContributions(target.textContent);
    }
  });

  const generateYearContributions = (year) => {
    tilesContainer.innerHTML = "";
    calendarContainer.querySelectorAll(".month").forEach((m) => m.remove());
    calendarContainer.querySelectorAll(".total").forEach((t) => t.remove());
    const data = allContributionData[year];
    const startRow = new Date(data[0].date).getDay();
    let latestMonth = -1;

    const monthFragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
    const tilesFragment = document.createDocumentFragment();

    let lastGridColumn = -1;

    const [tiles, totalStatistical] = data.reduce(
      ([tiles, stats], c, i) => {
        const date = new Date(c.date);
        const month = date.getMonth();

        // 统计逻辑
        stats.count += c.count;
        stats.post += c.post;

        // 处理月份标签
        if (date.getDay() === 0 && month !== latestMonth) {
          let gridColumn = 2 + Math.floor((i + startRow) / 7);
          if (gridColumn - lastGridColumn <= 1) {
            gridColumn += (2 - gridColumn + lastGridColumn); // 防止重叠
          }
          lastGridColumn = gridColumn;
          latestMonth = month;
          const monthLabel = document.createElement("span");
          monthLabel.className = "month";
          monthLabel.textContent = MONTH_NAMES[month];
          monthLabel.style.gridColumn = gridColumn;
          monthFragment.append(monthLabel);
        }
        // 创建日历格子
        const tile = document.createElement("i");
        tile.className = "tile";
        tile.dataset.level = c.level;
        tile.title = getTooltip(c, date);
        tile.dataset.level = c.level;
        tile.dataset.date = c.date; // 添加日期数据
        tile.addEventListener('click', tileClickHandler);
        
        /** 不方便点击内部文章链接
          tile.addEventListener('mouseenter', tileClickHandler);
          tile.addEventListener('mouseleave', hideTooltip);
        */
        tiles.push(tile);
        return [tiles, stats];
      },
      [[], { count: 0, post: 0 }],
    );

    // 处理首格位置
    if (tiles[0]) {
      tiles[0].style.gridRow = startRow + 1;
    }

    tilesFragment.append(...tiles);

    calendarContainer.append(monthFragment);
    tilesContainer.append(tilesFragment);

    calendarContainer.insertAdjacentHTML(
      "beforeend",
      `<div class="total">${pluralize(totalStatistical.post, "post")} ${pluralize(totalStatistical.count, "word")} in ${year}</div>`,
    );
  };

  // 初始化显示当前年份的日历
  generateYearContributions(currentDisplayYear);
}

function completeContributionData(userData) {
  // 对用户数据按日期排序
  userData.sort((a, b) => a.date - b.date);

  // 获取起始日期和当前日期
  const startDate = new Date(userData[0].date);
  const currentDate = new Date();

  // 初始化结果数组
  const allData = {};
  // 创建映射表
  const userDataMap = {};
  userData.forEach((data) => {
    const dataDate = new Date(data.date);
    const key = `${dataDate.getFullYear()}-${dataDate.getMonth()}-${dataDate.getDate()}`;
    userDataMap[key] = data;
  });

  // 遍历年份
  for (
    let year = startDate.getFullYear();
    year <= currentDate.getFullYear();
    year++
  ) {
    const [startYear, endYear] =
      year === currentDate.getFullYear()
        ? [
            new Date(
              new Date(currentDate).setDate(currentDate.getDate() - 365),
            ),
            new Date(currentDate.getTime() + 86400000),
          ]
        : [new Date(year, 0, 1), new Date(year + 1, 0, 1)];

    const yearData = [];
    for (let d = startYear; d < endYear; d.setDate(d.getDate() + 1)) {
      const key = `${d.getFullYear()}-${d.getMonth()}-${d.getDate()}`;
      yearData.push(
        userDataMap[key] || {
          level: 0,
          date: d.getTime(),
          count: 0,
          post: 0,
        },
      );
    }
    allData[year] = yearData;
  }
  return allData;
}

// 获取日期数据
var articleStats = {{ $articlesData }};

function getLevelFromWordCount(totalCount) {
  const levelStandard = {{ $levelStandard }}.split(",").map(Number);
  if (totalCount <= 0) return 0;
  if (totalCount <= levelStandard[0]) return 1;
  if (totalCount <= levelStandard[1]) return 2;
  if (totalCount <= levelStandard[2]) return 3;
  return 4;
}

var currentDate = new Date();

function transformArticlesData(articlesData) {
  const dailyStats = articlesData.reduce((map, { date, wordcount }) => {
    if (new Date(date) > currentDate) {
      return map; // 忽略未来的日期
    }
    const entry = map.get(date) ?? { count: 0, post: 0 };
    return map.set(date, {
      count: entry.count + wordcount,
      post: entry.post + 1,
    });
  }, new Map());

  return Array.from(dailyStats, ([dayStr, { count, post }]) => ({
    level: getLevelFromWordCount(count),
    date: new Date(dayStr).getTime(),
    count,
    post,
  }));
}

createCalendar(document.querySelector("#heatmap"), transformArticlesData(articleStats));
</script>


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\heatMapCard.xml
==================================================



==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\link.html
==================================================

{{- $target := or (.Get "link") (.Get "path") -}}
{{- $cover := .Get "cover" -}}
{{- $escape := .Get "escape" | default true -}}
{{- $titleParam := .Get "title" -}}

{{- if not $target -}}
	{{- errorf "link shortcode: link/path parameter is required" -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $protocolPattern := `^(?:https?://|mailto:|tel:)` -}}
{{- $isExternal := gt (len (findRE $protocolPattern $target)) 0 -}}

{{- $href := "" -}}
{{- $title := "" -}}
{{- $excerpt := "" -}}

{{- if $isExternal -}}
	{{- if not $titleParam -}}
		{{- errorf "link shortcode: title is required for external links" -}}
	{{- end -}}
	{{- $title = $titleParam -}}
	{{- $href = $target -}}
	{{- $excerpt = (printf `<span class="icon-link"></span>%s` $target) | safeHTML -}}
{{- else -}}
	{{- $page := .Site.GetPage $target -}}
	{{- if not $page -}}
		{{- errorf "link shortcode: page not found: %s" $target -}}
	{{- end -}}
	{{- $title = $page.Title -}}
	{{- $href = $page.Permalink | relURL -}}
	{{- if $page.Params.description -}}
		{{- $excerpt = $page.Params.description | plainify | truncate 100 -}}
	{{- else if $page.Summary -}}
		{{- $excerpt = $page.Summary | plainify | truncate 100 -}}
	{{- else -}}
		{{- $excerpt = $page.RawContent | truncate 100 -}}
	{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $displayTitle := $title -}}
{{- if not $escape -}}
	{{- $displayTitle = $title | safeHTML -}}
{{- end -}}

<div class="post-link-card-wrap">
	<div class="post-link-card">
		<a
			href="{{ $href }}"
			title="{{ $title }}"
			{{- if $isExternal -}} rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer" target="_blank"{{- end -}}
		></a>
		{{- if eq $cover "auto" -}}
			{{- if $isExternal -}}
				<div class="post-link-card-cover-wrap auto">
					<div class="icon-globe"></div>
				</div>
			{{- else -}}
				<div class="post-link-card-cover-wrap">
					<img
						src="{{ .Site.Params.banner | relURL }}"
						class="no-lightbox"
						title="{{ $title }}"
						alt="{{ $title }}"
					/>
				</div>
			{{- end -}}
		{{- else if $cover -}}
			<div class="post-link-card-cover-wrap">
				<img
					src="{{ $cover | relURL }}"
					class="no-lightbox"
					title="{{ $title }}"
					alt="{{ $title }}"
				/>
			</div>
		{{- end -}}
		<div class="post-link-card-item-wrap">
			<div class="post-link-card-title">{{ $displayTitle }}</div>
			<div class="post-link-card-excerpt">
				{{- $excerpt -}}
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\tabs.html
==================================================

{{- $raw := .Inner -}}
{{- $arg0 := .Get 0 -}}
{{- $arg1 := .Get 1 -}}
{{- $align := "" -}}
{{- $tabActive := 0 -}}

{{- if eq $arg0 "center" -}}
	{{- $align = " center" -}}
{{- else if $arg0 -}}
	{{- if (gt (len (findRE `^\d+$` $arg0)) 0) -}}
		{{- $tabActive = (int $arg0) -}}
	{{- end -}}
	{{- if eq $arg1 "center" -}}
		{{- $align = " center" -}}
	{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- $ordinal := default (now.UnixNano) .Ordinal -}}
{{- $tabName := printf "tab_%s_%d" (substr (md5 $raw) 0 8) $ordinal -}}

{{- $delim := "§§TAB§§" -}}
{{- $prepared := replace $raw "<!-- tab" (print $delim "<!-- tab") -}}
{{- $chunks := split $prepared $delim -}}
{{- $tabs := slice -}}
{{- range $i, $c := $chunks -}}
	{{- if gt $i 0 -}}
		{{- $header := (replaceRE `(?s)^<!--\s*tab\s*(.*?)\s*-->.*` "$1" $c) | strings.TrimSpace -}}
		{{- if ne $header "" -}}
			{{- $bodyRaw := (replaceRE `(?s)^<!--\s*tab\s*(.*?)\s*-->` "" $c) -}}
			{{- $tabs = $tabs | append (dict "header" $header "body" $bodyRaw) -}}
		{{- end -}}
	{{- end -}}
{{- end -}}

{{- if lt (len $tabs) 1 -}}
	{{- /* 无有效 tab 时不输出 */ -}}
{{- else -}}
	{{- $nav := slice -}}
	{{- $panes := slice -}}
	{{- range $i, $t := $tabs -}}
		{{- $header := $t.header -}}
		{{- $parts := split $header "@" -}}
		{{- $icon := "" -}}
		{{- $caption := "" -}}
		{{- if gt (len $parts) 1 -}}
			{{- $icon = index $parts (sub (len $parts) 1) -}}
			{{- $caption = delimit (first (sub (len $parts) 1) $parts) "@" -}}
		{{- else -}}
			{{- $caption = $header -}}
		{{- end -}}

		{{- $id := printf "%s-%d" $tabName (add $i 1) | lower -}}
		{{- if and (eq (len (strings.TrimSpace $caption)) 0) (eq (len (strings.TrimSpace $icon)) 0) -}}
			{{- $caption = printf "%s %d" $tabName (add $i 1) -}}
		{{- end -}}

		{{- $isActive := or (and (gt $tabActive 0) (eq $tabActive (add $i 1))) (and (eq $tabActive 0) (eq (add $i 1) 1)) -}}

		{{- $iconHtml := "" -}}
		{{- if gt (len (strings.TrimSpace $icon)) 0 -}}
			{{- $iconHtml = printf `<span class="icon" style="margin:0 4px;">&#x%s;</span>` (strings.TrimSpace $icon) -}}
		{{- end -}}
		{{- $nav = $nav | append (printf `<li class="tab%[1]s"><a class="#%[2]s">%[3]s%[4]s</a></li>` (cond $isActive " active" "") $id $iconHtml (htmlEscape $caption)) -}}

		{{- $rendered := ($t.body | markdownify | strings.TrimSpace) -}}
		{{- $panes = $panes | append (printf `<div class="tab-pane%[1]s" id="%[2]s">%[3]s</div>` (cond $isActive " active" "") $id $rendered) -}}
	{{- end -}}

	<div class="tabs" id="tab-{{ $tabName }}">
		<ul class="nav-tabs{{ $align }}">{{ safeHTML (delimit $nav "") }}<div class="tab-indicator"></div></ul>
		<div class="tab-content">{{ safeHTML (delimit $panes "") }}</div>
	</div>
  {{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/tabs.scss" "temp" "tabs.scss" "target" "css/tabs.css" "ctx" .) -}}
{{- end -}}



==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\tagRoulette.html
==================================================

<!--
    标签轮盘: 点击游戏手柄emoji（🕹️）触发滚动效果,从预定义的标签数组中随机选择标签显示
    卡片抄自：5ime作者的博客 https://5ime.cn/hello-2024.html#%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E%E6%88%91
        致谢！！！
-->

{{- $inputTags := .Get "tags" | default "点击按钮抽取标签,标签轮盘,带有模糊效果,好想睡觉" -}}
{{- $icon := .Get "icon" | default "🕹️" -}}

<div class="roll">
    <div class="roll-button" onclick="rollTagRoulette()">{{ $icon }}</div>
    <div class="roll-tags"><span class="ready removing"></span></div>
</div>

<script>
var rollTagRoulette = () => {
    // 当你看到这行字，你知道我要说什么吧。
    var tags = {{ $inputTags }}.split(",");
    var tag = document.querySelector('.roll-tags');
    tag.innerHTML = '';

    var interval = setInterval(function () {
        var span = document.createElement('span');
        span.classList.add('ready');
        span.classList.add('blur');
        span.innerText = tags[Math.floor(Math.random() * tags.length)];
        tag.appendChild(span);
        spans = tag.querySelectorAll('span');
        for (var i = 0; i < spans.length; i++) {
            spans[i].classList.add('removing');
        }
    }, 200);
    
    setTimeout(function () {
        clearInterval(interval);
        for (var i = 0; i < spans.length-1; i++) {
            tag.removeChild(spans[i]);
        }
        setTimeout(function () {
            spans[spans.length-1].classList.remove('blur');
        }, 100);
    }, 1000);
}

rollTagRoulette(); // 页面加载时自动触发一次滚动
</script>

{{- partial "helpers/scss.html" (dict "source" "css/tag-roulette.scss" "temp" "tag-roulette.scss" "target" "css/tag-roulette.css" "ctx" .) -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\shortcodes\tagRoulette.xml
==================================================



==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\_default\baseof.html
==================================================

<!doctype html>
<html
  lang="{{ .Site.Language.LanguageCode }}" 
  {{ if eq .Site.Params.dark_mode.enable true -}}
    data-theme-mode="true"
  {{ else if eq .Site.Params.dark_mode.enable false -}}
    data-theme-mode="false"
  {{ else if eq .Site.Params.dark_mode.enable "auto" -}}
    data-theme-mode="auto"
  {{ end -}}
>
  <head>
    {{- if .Site.Params.injector.head_begin -}}
      {{- .Site.Params.injector.head_begin | safeHTML -}}
    {{- end -}}
    {{- partial "head.html" . -}}
    {{- if .Site.Params.injector.head_end -}}
      {{- .Site.Params.injector.head_end | safeHTML -}}
    {{- end -}}
  </head>
  <body>
    {{- if .Site.Params.injector.body_begin -}}
      {{- .Site.Params.injector.body_begin | safeHTML -}}
    {{- end -}}
    {{- partialCached "loader.html" . -}}
    <div id="container">
      <div id="wrap">
        {{- partial "header.html" . -}}
        <div id="content"
          aria-label="Page content"
          {{ if or (and (eq .Site.Params.sidebar "left") (eq .Params.sidebar nil)) (eq .Params.sidebar "left") }}class="sidebar-left"{{ end }}
          {{ if or (and (eq .Site.Params.sidebar "right") (eq .Params.sidebar nil)) (eq .Params.sidebar "right") }}class="sidebar-right"{{ end }}  >
          {{- partial "sidebar.html" . -}}
          <section id="main" aria-label="Main content">{{ block "main" . }}{{ end }}</section>
        </div>
        {{- partialCached "footer.html" . -}}
        {{- if .Site.Params.top.enable -}}
          <div class="sidebar-top">
            <div class="sidebar-top-taichi {{ if .Site.Params.top.icon.rotate }}rotate{{ end }}"></div>
            <div class="arrow-up"></div>
          </div>
        {{- end -}}
        <div id="mask" class="hide"></div>
      </div>
      {{- partial "mobilebar.html" . -}}
    </div>
    {{- if .Site.Params.algolia_search.enable -}}
      <div class="site-search">
        <div class="reimu-popup popup">
          <div class="reimu-search">
            <div class="reimu-search-input-icon"></div>
            <div id="reimu-search-input"></div>
            <div class="popup-btn-close"></div>
          </div>
          <div class="reimu-results">
            <div id="reimu-stats"></div>
            <div id="reimu-hits"></div>
            <div id="reimu-pagination" class="reimu-pagination"></div>
          </div>
          <img class="reimu-bg" src="{{ "images/reimu.png" | relURL }}" />
        </div>
      </div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.aplayer.enable (not .Site.Params.player.meting.enable) .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed -}}
      <div id="aplayer" theme="var(--color-link)"></div>
    {{- end -}}
    {{- if and .Site.Params.player.meting.enable .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed -}}
      <meting-js
        theme="var(--color-link)"
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.id nil }}id="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.id }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server nil }}server="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.server }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type nil }}type="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.type }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto nil }}auto="{{ .Site.Params.player.meting.options.auto }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed nil }}fixed="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.fixed }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay nil }}autoplay="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.autoplay }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop nil }}loop="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.loop }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order nil }}order="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.order }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload nil }}preload="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.preload }}"{{ end -}}
        {{ if ne .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume nil }}volume="{{ .Site.Params.player.aplayer.options.volume }}"{{ end -}}

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\_default\list.algolia.json
==================================================

{{- $limit := 1000 -}}
[
  {{- range $index, $entry := where .Page.Site.RegularPages "Section" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections -}}
  {{ if $index }}, {{ end }}
  {
    "objectID": "{{ sha1 .RelPermalink }}",
    "permalink": "{{ .Permalink | relURL }}",
    "title": {{ .Title | jsonify }},
    {{- if gt .WordCount $limit -}}
    "content": {{ .Plain | truncate $limit | jsonify | safeJS }},
    {{- else -}}
    "content": {{ .Plain | jsonify | safeJS }},
    {{- end -}}
    "date": {{ .Date.Format $.Site.Params.timeFormat | jsonify }},
    "updated": {{ .Lastmod.Format $.Site.Params.timeFormat | jsonify }}
  }
  {{- end -}}
]

==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\_default\rss.xml
==================================================

{{- $authorEmail := site.Params.email }}
{{- $authorName := site.Params.author }}

{{- $showFullContent := .Site.Params.rss.showFullContent | default false }}
{{- $showCopyright := .Site.Params.rss.showCopyright | default false }}
{{- $currentLanguage := .Language.Lang | default "en" }}
{{- $copyright := i18n "article_copyright.license_content" (.Site.Params.article_copyright.content.license_type | upper) -}}

{{- /* 确定页面上下文 */ -}}
{{- $pctx := . }}
{{- if .IsHome }}{{ $pctx = .Site }}{{ end }}
{{- $pages := $pctx.RegularPages }}
{{- $mainSections := .Site.MainSections }}
{{- $pages = where $pages "Section" "in" $mainSections }}
{{- if hugo.IsMultilingual }}
  {{- $pages = where $pages "Language.Lang" $currentLanguage }}
{{- end }}

{{- $pages = $pages.ByLastmod.Reverse }}
{{- $limit := .Site.Params.rss.limit | default 10 }}
{{- if ge $limit 1 }}
  {{- $pages = $pages | first $limit }}
{{- end }}

{{- printf "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" standalone=\"yes\"?>" | safeHTML }}
<rss version="2.0" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
  <channel>
    <title>{{ if eq .Title .Site.Title }}{{ .Site.Title }}{{ else }}{{ with .Title }}{{ . }} on {{ end }}{{ .Site.Title }}{{ end }}</title>
    <link>{{ .Permalink }}</link>
    <description>Recent content from {{ .Site.Title }}</description>
    <generator>Hugo</generator>
    <language>{{ site.Language.LanguageCode }}</language>
    {{ with $authorEmail }}
    <managingEditor>{{ . }}{{ with $authorName }} ({{ . }}){{ end }}</managingEditor>
    <webMaster>{{ . }}{{ with $authorName }} ({{ . }}){{ end }}</webMaster>
    {{ end }}
    <copyright>{{ $copyright }}</copyright>
    {{ if not .Date.IsZero }}
    <lastBuildDate>{{ (index $pages 0).Lastmod.Format "Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 -0700" | safeHTML }}</lastBuildDate>
    {{ end }}
    {{ with .OutputFormats.Get "RSS" }}
    <atom:link href="{{ .Permalink }}" rel="self" type="{{ .MediaType }}" />
    {{ end }}

    {{ range $pages }}
    {{- /* 构建多语言文章头部 */ -}}
    {{- $articleHeaderI18n := i18n "rss.author" (dict "name" $authorName "email" $authorEmail) -}}
    {{- $articleHeader := printf "<![CDATA[<h1>%s</h1><p>%s</p>" .Title $articleHeaderI18n -}}

    {{- /* 构建多语言文章尾部 */ -}}
    {{- $articleFooterContent := printf "<a href='%s'>%s</a>" .Site.BaseURL .Site.Title -}}
    {{- $articleFooterI18n := i18n "rss.date" (dict "pubDate" (.Date.Format "2006-01-02") "lastmod" (.Lastmod.Format "2006-01-02") "content" ($articleFooterContent | safeHTML)) -}}
    {{- $articleFooter := printf "<hr><p>%s</p>" $articleFooterI18n -}}

    {{- if $showCopyright }}
      {{ $articleFooter = printf "%s<p>%s</p>" $articleFooter $copyright }}
    {{- end }}
    {{ $articleFooter = printf "%s]]>" $articleFooter }}

    <item>
      <title>{{ .Title }}</title>
      <link>{{ .Permalink }}</link>
      <pubDate>{{ .PublishDate.Format "Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 -0700" }}</pubDate>
      {{ with $authorEmail }}<author>{{ . }}{{ with $authorName }} ({{ . }}){{ end }}</author>{{ end }}
      <guid>{{ .Permalink }}</guid>
      <description>
        {{ $articleHeader | safeHTML }}
        {{ if $showFullContent }}
          {{ .Content | safeHTML }}
        {{ else }}
          {{ .Summary | safeHTML }}
        {{ end }}
        {{ $articleFooter | safeHTML }}
      </description>
      {{ with .Params.categories }}
        {{ range . }}<category>{{ . }}</category>{{ end }}
      {{ end }}
    </item>
    {{ end }}
  </channel>
</rss>


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\_default\single.html
==================================================

{{- define "main" -}}
  {{- partial "article.html" . -}}
{{- end -}}


==================================================
FILE: .\themes\reimu\layouts\_default\taxonomy.html
==================================================

{{- define "main" -}}
  {{- $type := .Type -}}

  {{- $sort_config := "date-reverse" -}}
  {{- if eq $type "categories" -}}
    {{- $sort_config = .Site.Params.sort_order.taxonomy.category -}}
  {{- else if eq $type "tags" -}}
    {{- $sort_config = .Site.Params.sort_order.taxonomy.tag -}}
  {{- end -}}

  {{- $paginator := .Paginator.Pages.GroupByDate .Site.Params.yearFormat "desc" -}}
  {{- if eq $sort_config "weight" -}}
    {{- $paginator = .Paginator.Pages.ByWeight -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "weight-reverse" -}}
    {{- $paginator = .Paginator.Pages.ByWeight.Reverse -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "date" -}}
    {{- $paginator = .Paginator.Pages.GroupByDate .Site.Params.yearFormat "asc" -}}
  {{- else if eq $sort_config "default" -}}
    {{- $paginator = .Paginator.Pages -}}
  {{- end -}}
  <div
    class="archives-outer-wrap"
    data-aos="{{ .Site.Params.animation.options.archive.whole }}"
  >
    {{- if .Site.Params.only_show_capsule_in_index -}}
      {{- if eq .Paginator.PageNumber 1 -}}
        {{- partialCached "archives.html" . -}}
      {{- end -}}
    {{- else -}}
      {{- partialCached "archives.html" . -}}
    {{- end -}}
    {{- partial "list.html" (dict "paginator" $paginator "ctx" .) -}}
  </div>
  {{- partial "pagination.html" . -}}
{{- end -}}
